description: Envie de réussir le code de la route? Envie de réviser vos classiques? Cette application est LA solution pour vous permettre de réviser l'examen du code de la route français et de mettre le maximum de chance de votre côté pour réussir permis de conduire. Idéal pour s'entraîner et réussir à l'examen, ou tout simplement pour réviser son code de la route. Cette version gratuite inclus: [x] Questions et réponses commentées et illustrées avec photos et possibilité de zoom, [x] Séries de 40 questions comme à l'examen du code de la route, [x] Statistiques indiquant si vous êtes en voie d'avoir votre examen. N'hésitez pas à laisser vos commentaires et remarques et à noter l'application. Want to pass the Highway Code? Want to brush up on your classics? This application is the solution for you to revise the code review of the French road and put the maximum chance of success for your next license. Ideal for training and pass the test, or just to revise its traffic. This free version includes: [X] Questions and answers and explained with photos and zoom capability, [X] series of 40 questions as to the consideration of traffic, [X] Data on whether you are on track to have your exam. Feel free to leave your comments and feedback and note application.
release_text: [x] Correction bug sur version non compatible avec la voix. [x] Lecture audio des questions et réponses (si compatible). [x] Prise en compte des remarques des utilisateurs. [x] Compatibilité Android 5.1.1. [x] Nouveaux design. [x] Suivi de progression. [x] Possibilité d'activer et de désactiver le chronomètre (40 secondes par question). [x] Possibilité d'agrandir la taille du texte en tapotant dessus. [x] Possibilité de signaler une question erronée.

description: The Official Manchester Airport Android App. The highly acclaimed Manchester Airport iPhone App is now available on your Android phone – With brand new, Android only features. Packed with all the information you could possibly need when flying to and from Manchester Airport the new Android app is a must. Features: - Live flight information on your favourite flights to your notification bar - Access your car park bookings and get directions with Google maps integration - Mark the exact location of your car in the car park - Full terminal maps and guides - Voice search for flights - Automatically recognise when you get to the airport to increase update frequency - Book Car parking, lounges and fast track Notes: The app and has been tested on a number of devices with OS up to ICS. Please send us your feedback to help improve everyone’s experience. App update frequency can be altered in the settings tab within the app All bookings are done via the secure Manchester Airport Mobile site, no payment information is held in the App

Learn the numbers from one to five with this easy to learn counting song. The song and animation stop at the end of each verse and you can use a switch or touch the screen to play the next verse. Clear graphics, which include the numbers and words to sing along with and high quality voice over to encourage correct pronunciation of the number names. The follow-up activities give lots of opportunities to see numbers and hear number names. • Counting up – touch the screen or press a switch to count up to five. • Count along number line – errorless activity using touch or switch to count to five with clear visual and auditory feedback for numbers and number names. • This set of activities is an enjoyable way to help a child become familiar with numbers from one to five. • Works with touch or single or two switch scanning. • Use a switch with any currently available Android switch interface.

Interactive, age-adapted educational app that teaches children the time through play. “My first Clock” is ideal for children from 5 years upwards who want to learn to tell the time while having fun. How it works: Select the mode by pressing the coloured buttons on the upper part of the screen - Orange: Set time: the current time can be adjusted by turning the hand. - Blue: Clock parts: learn which parts of the clock are important for reading the time correctly. - Green: Hours and Minutes: Which hand is faster? Which hand shows the hours and which shows the minutes? How long is a minute and how long is an hour? - Red: Quarters of an hour: Quarter hours are explained using pieces of cake as an example. - Yellow: To and Past: What do TO and PAST mean and how do the hands help to understand which is which? A detailed explanation is available for each mode and can be listened to again at any time. The game incorporates different mechanisms, to encourage the children to want to discover and try out what is explained. An encouraging speaker leads the children through the app step by step, simply and clearly explaining what to do. After each action, the child receives immediate feedback about whether the action was right or wrong. Main features: - Exciting educational games - An encouraging native speaker guides the child through the app - Child-friendly and clear graphics - Teaches how to tell the time - Teaches through discovery and by trying - Introduces the different parts and functions of the clock: hands, numbers and dial - Teaches how to set the clock, using movable hands - Different game modes distinguished by colours and graphics - Includes a help feature for further assistance and explanations If you have any problems, questions or suggestions, please contact us direct: iphone@ravensburger-digital.com Have a look at the other kids' apps from Ravensburger like "Karl's Castle", "Whoowasit?", "THE aMAZEing Labyrinth" and many others.

A great tool to cheat on black jack. Practice card counting is no longer necessary. Press volume up when high cards being delt, press volume down for low. The phone vibrates when it´s time to increase the bet. The "Tiles left" value indicates when you have the edge. The higher number the better. Further instructions included in the application.
release_text: Optional functions added Slide function, slide upwards for high cards or down for low. Option to invert the counting, up for increase and down for decrease. That lets you to combine the phone and the in head counting in a creative way. Phone does not fall asleep when running the app Minor fixes

description: ★Multi-Account is supported now！★ Are you still worried about missing your important emails? Are you still searching for a simple and useful email app? Now you have GO Email Widget. Once you have it, you can just send/receive emails directly on your screen. Absolutely no need to open any email app! GO Email Widget supports most of the popular email boxes in the world. It provides you a fast and simple way to configure your account. You can do everything you want just like how you do it in any email app. To make it work, you must install the latest version of GO Launcher EX which is the most popular home launcher in Android Market. If you have install the beta version of the Email Widget, Please uninstall it first before you install the V1.0. Available Size: - 4×4 Actions: - Send/Receive emails - Support POP3/IMAP - Download/Send Attachment - Change Themes How to add GOWidgets on your home screen? -Long press on your home screen in GO Launcher, press the GOWidget option and choose the widget you like. Make sure you have enough room for the widget. How to set the Yahoo Email? -You should Manual setup your account. -If you choose the IMAP,please enter the "android.imap.mail.yahoo.com" in the IMAP sever -If you choose the POP3,please enter the "pop.mail.yahoo.com " in the POP3 server

Educational game. Drawing on the cells and graphics dictation - a very exciting and useful exercise for children ages 5 to 10 years. This is the way of creativity, spatial imagination, coordination, attention and perseverance for children. No Ads. The game provides five modes: 1. Lines - connect the dots in a sequence 2. Cells - paint with a pattern of squares and triangles 3. Graphic dictation - draw a line from the starting point for direction's (number of cells and direction).. 4. Free drawing of lines 5. Free drawing of squares and triangles Supported languages​​: English, German, Russian, Korean.
release_text: 1. Fixed problem with orientation on tablet devices

description: Kids from 2 to 6 will have fun solving their first puzzles. With 4 (12 in full version) different puzzles, nice sound effects, beautiful graphics, this game will entertain your children while improving their motor skills. This game is part of your "Learning is fun" educational game collection. Visit our website for more educative games: http://ar-entertainment.net/android

HOMEWORK HELP is an app that can be used as a complement and a variation of the homework studies. It is often stressful to get time for homework when you get home from activities or late afternoons, and homework easily becomes a stress for both parents and children.. This can lead to school and homework becoming a negative part of the day. HOMEWORK HELP works perfectly for studying number buddies, doubles, the multiplication table, counting with plus and minus. HOMEWORK HELP is an app that you will use for several school years. Studying homework every day can be a challenge for both the child and the parent. As a complement and variation of the regular homework routines, you can use this application. HOMEWORK HELP needs no connection, which for example means you can study the week’s homework in the car or on the bus.

Al Rajhi Bank offers this free App for Android smart phone users to explore a new innovative dimension of online and mobile banking. The app consists of vibrant graphics, user friendly interface, convenient navigation combined with the latest security. The App allows you do most of your banking transactions in addition to various exciting and useful tools such as Currency Converter and ATM Locator. Android App guarantees your satisfaction and will make your banking experience useful and enjoyable. To use the online banking service you are required to provide your Al Mubasher Retail Internet Banking User ID and Password, if you are not registered, please follow the link to register on Al Mubasher Internet banking https://www.almubasher.com.sa/registration/logon.do So, gear yourself with our latest e-banking facility and do all your banking on the move, wherever and whenever ! Works best with smartphones using Android version 2.3.6, 4.0 and above.

description: Talk lets you convert text to voice using the Text-to-speech engine on your smartphone. It allows importing web pages directly from the browser to listen to them. You can also import selected text from other apps. Features: -Text to voice -Read web pages -Play / Pause / Stop -Export audio as WAV file -Lots of languages (internet connection required for some) Make your phone say anything you want in many languages! Let your phone read the news for you! There's a free version with ads available here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ktix007.talk NOTE: Your phone must have a Text-to-Speech enginge for Talk to work. If it doesn't have it you can download it from Google Play. Depending on the TTS engine, some languages that appear in the app may not work. G+ community: https://plus.google.com/communities/107986392540899459664
release_text: -v1.60 huge update! Export audio as WAV (new permissions). The paragraph that's playing is highlighted. New progressbar, lets you scroll through paragraphs. Change pitch and speed. Tons of bug fixes. -v1.5x Pause when receiving calls (new permissions). Change text size. Progress bar. Keep screen on. Import from webpage improved (now support Flipboard & more). Fixed rotation bug.

description: This App addresses European keyboard command compatibility issues found in Samsung Tablets when using @, € and # marks. This application will take the place of the current physical keyboard in your tablet, and must be set manually upon install. This is a bug fix and relates to the following keyboards: F5L154. Using the app in addition to your keyboard will allow you to use these and other marks. How to install Samsung Keyboard App • Download Belkin Keyboard Extension Kit App from the Play store • App will run automatically • Once installed go to the settings icon and click it • Scroll to “language and input” select • Under Keyboards and input methods • Under Default sub screen keyboards check the Belkin Character Extension (check mark) • Hit ok on pop up menu (we do not collect any data) • To the right of the App is a setting cog, click that and select your language, only choose one language • Hit back • Go to Default Keyboard and click the Belkin Character Extension • Complete Note: When Samsung tablets power down they revert to their native keyboard. If this happens, you will have to manually change your keyboard again.

Are all of your shoes, sneakers and boots still laced up the way they were when you bought them? "Lacing Shoes Lessons" is a program-instruction how to tie the laces on your everyday and special shoes. There is a lot of unusual, beautiful, practical and useful lacing methods. Each method includes simple colored diagrams and a real photo.
release_text: Lacing added: Asterix, Hexagram, Pentagram1, Pentagram2.

description: If you and your kids love stories and storytelling, this is the ebook for you! The Animal Pond is an educational storytelling, drawing and coloring app for kids and children, and helps them: • Read a story • Learn words • Read sentences • Identify shapes • Draw freehand and colour • Colour pages • Learn the importance of cleanliness, togetherness and teamwork • Enhance their visual memory and many more things. Download this interactive eBook and watch the characters come alive as you read along. The Animal Pond interactive eBook contains a story that is automatically read out loud in a captivating manner. In order to help kids and children learn to pronounce words, a built-in feature pronounces individual words when the user taps on those words in the story text. As children move through the interactive story, not only do they become friends with a motley bunch of animal characters, but they also learn about the importance of clean water and clean surroundings, taking decisions, appealing to society for change, helping each other in times of need, and much more through activities, drawing, coloring, sketching, etc. The Animal Pond interactive eBook contains several built-in fun, educational activities that kids and children would love to do over and over again. A variety of drawing, coloring, and sketching tools, combined with an unlimited palette of colors is guaranteed to provide hours of entertainment to your kid. Activities like dialogue recognition and identifying synonyms build cognitive skills, whereas those like writing the moral of the story and sharing it to Facebook help in developing analytical skills, while at the same time being fun, too! The Animal Pond interactive eBook is a wonderful learning game for enabling kids and children to pick up a variety of cognitive and developmental skills. This app will keep kids and children busy and constructively engaged for hours at a time, while giving them the building blocks for better, enhanced learning throughout their life. This application supports only Android tablets, for android phones download tablet version.

Tweak a stock car! Customize it, lower it and mod it until the car becomes a fly street racer fully upgraded with aftermarket parts. **** SUPER SALE! This month only! This is the early bird discount; the price won't stay this low for long. **** In this automotive project you'll have fun discovering your auto, mechanical skills while learning about performance upgrades and how custom car modifications are installed in the real world. Find tools, use them, order parts and bring the vehicle to a racing quality using a private, professional body shop. This is where you come to work on one of the coolest cars, and you'll do it for the love of cars; it's fun and entertaining! If you like our original Fix My Car game, this game will not disappoint. This is a full version app which includes over 60 car related upgrades and mods (tasks). Each come with a step-by-step walkthrough (including 200 on demand, integrated hints and solutions) that will push you in the correct direction but only if you ask for it. With this full version, you also get to go beyond the chop work, do upgrades inside of the car, detail the outside and complete all the really good mods (NOS, rims and tires, new engine, souped up sound system, paint, entertainment/TV in the trunk, etc...). This game is available in many languages including the language you are reading this description in. The language will load automatically based on the language of your device. As for your game progress, the game will auto-save your every move so you can always undo a step or take a break. Please do not spoil the fun for others by posting solutions in the comments. Instead, come and find us (FireRabbit) on Facebook. If you're interested, here are is a sample of the in-game tasks: *** With the new engine in place it is time to boost this ride with NOS (nitrous oxide). Find the tanks and install them. *** Lower the car by swapping out the old suspension with a new one. *** The stock bumper needs an upgrade for both racing looks and lower weight drag. Find a quality bumper with an aggressive forward lip. *** This car is going to be about performance and speed. It is therefore important to have a technical gauge cluster for the various pressures. Find and install the gauges. *** Racing around tight corners can really shuffle a driver around in a car. Buckets seats are a great way to help keep a driver centered, and safe. Find and install 2 buckets seats. *** This car is going to need some sweet aluminum rims; a key investment for a racer especially when upgrading from the stock "mag wheels". Build a complete set. *** The engine will need about 4 liters of quality oil to operate. Find the oil and put it in the engine block. *** Take the stock wheels off the car. This will allow you to work on the brakes and suspension. *** The stock hood weighs too much for racing and it does not provide an air intake for a racing engine. Find and install a dual-scoop fiberglass hood. *** This car will need some ground effects to really amaze at night and during races. Find all of the 6 LED ground effects first and then install them. *** The trunk is a great place to create a multimedia center for tailgate parties. Find and install a game console. *** To support large speakers and subwoofers, two parallel amps will be needed for extra amperage. Find 2 amps and install them in the trunk. *** The car has NOS but there is currently no way to action the NOS. Find and install a NOS switch.

description: White Pages helps you find contact details for people, businesses and government departments from the convenience of your phone. Choose to see the location of a listing on a map, view the route from where you are or simply place a call. Features include: - Predictive text displays suggestions as you type - Interactive maps with touch pan/zoom, photo view and full screen options - Find nearby results using GPS. - View listings on a map and get directions using GPS. We're aiming to continually improve so tell us know what you think of White Pages for your phone. We are always happy to hear from you. By downloading White Pages to your phone you agree to the terms located at the "Legal" link below.
release_text: - Improved loading of search results, allowing users to browse the results while additional content is still loading - Added a network indicator, to help identify when the app is working even if no changes are apparent on-screen - Enhanced Share option (including Share To Twitter) - My List (sign up and reset password all through the app) - Performance improvements and bug fixes

関西』を追加しました。 (2015.6.4)16年度版『ドライブ 絶景＆グルメ 東海・北陸 信州』を追加しました。 (2015.6.2)16年度版『ドライブ 絶景＆グルメ 関東・甲信越』を追加しました。 ・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・ 「遊ぶ」「食べる」「買う」「見る」「泊まる」のおすすめ情報をぎっしり収録した、ガイドブックの大定番『まっぷるマガジン』の電子書籍アプリです。 World Now shows images from a variety of satellite instruments for any location on earth. Move a cursor anywhere on a map of the world to see the near real-time output from NASA's LANCE data providers for that area, to observe weather and other conditions. A precise location can be entered from the menu, if desired. All images are courtesy of NASA LANCE.

En esta aplicación podrás conocer la proyección meteorológica oficial para los próximos 3 días en el Municipio de Sevilla, España. Específicamente, se ofrece información del estado del cielo, temperaturas mínimas y máximas y la probabilidad de precipitación. In this application you will know the official weather forecast for the next 3 days in the city of Seville, Spain. Specifically, information about the state of the sky, minimum and maximum temperatures and precipitation probability is provided.

Welcome to Holy Bible Quotes and Verses. This Application has been developed with the idea of bringing comfort, knowledge, inspiration and encouragement to all those who use this app. Life is often challenging, but the Bible teaches us how to live our lives and cope with our problems. In this Application we've taken thousands of verses and appropriately arranged them into different meaningful categories. This has been done to facilitate your search for answers from God's Holy Word regarding any type of situation, good or bad, that you may be facing. There are 25+ Categories and 50+ Books. More Categories and quotes are updated often. So stay tuned for new and exciting features. Features: -King James Version (KJV) and The World English Bible (WEB) two of the most popular Christian versions that are currently supported. -Swipe left or right gestures to navigate. -More than 1700+ and counting. -Filters (you can specify which Book (Psalms, Proverbs ...) and categories (Anger, Family ...) you want the app to read) -Multiple Widgets Support (Updates every day) -Quick sharing feature that enables sharing via SMS, Facebook and other sharing apps. -Bookmark and quickly browse through the favourites. Please give a good rating if you like the application. :) * Please do not report any problems in the comments section. Please send us an email instead. Thanks *

description: Chakra Stimulation is an ancient art used by Practitioners of Yoga and Meditation experts to heighten spiritual awareness. Spiritual energy is the core of every ability you possess, and Chakras are the factories of this spiritual energy. In several ways, the Chakras are the most important thing to develop. The human nervous system is a network connecting the sensory organs to the brain. The Chakras, or energy centers, act as a "pump" which direct spiritual energy through this system. For example, Earth energy is drawn up through your Root Chakra and passed to the Sacral Chakra which is then passed to the Solar Plexus, then the heart, then throat, brow, and finally the crown. Once energy reaches beyond the crown, experiences and sensations move to realms beyond explanation. The Chakra system is considered by many to be the most important system to work on. It is a base on which most other development is built. The Chakra Stimulating system stimulates each of the seven Chakras with different frequency ranges and predetermined base frequencies. It has been reported to be extremely effective by users worldwide! The minds of yogis undergoing deep spiritual progression have been studied for years, and now by integrating our system into what we know of their brain patterns, we are able to give you the tools to reproduce their experiences!

description: تطبيق وادي الذئاب (بالتركية: Kurtlar Vadisi) و هو مسلسل درامي بوليسي تركي مدبلج إلى اللغة العربية باللهجة السورية والمروف أيضا مرادعلم دار بطل المخابرات السريه للحكومة التركي والذي لديه مهمة القضاء على المافيا في تركيا وتتطلب هذه المهمة تغيير وجهه ونسيان ماضيه بالكامل وتغيير اسمه الحقيقي علي جندان . وكما يوجد الكثير من الابطال المعروفين في كافة الأجزاء السبعه ومنهم ميمياتي ، سليمان شاكر ، رهف ايلول وغيرهم من الابطال المعروفين. وبعد اجزاءه السبعه تم عمل فلمين لمسلسل وادي الذئاب وهما : فيلم وادي الذئاب فلسطين و فيلم وادي الذئاب العراق مسلسل وادي الذئاب من أكثر المسلسلات التركية البولسيه المعروفه بالكثير من الاحداث الغامضه والمثيره والاحداث السياسيه والاسخباراتيه الشيقه. حيث يتم تصفح حلقات المسلسل التي تريدها بعرض فيديو لها وكما يمكن اضافة الحلقات إلى قائمة مفضلة لديك وخاصه داخل حساب المستخدم ، وايضا تستطيع مشاركه الحلقات ونشرها على شبكات التواصل الاجتماعي : فيسبوك و تويتر ، ويضم التطبيق أيضا خدمة المشاركة والتعليق على الحلقات التي تعجبك. تابع وشاهد معنا الكثير من الاحداث المثيره والشيقه

Learn about Binoculars Power : Power means the degree to which the subject being looked at is magnified or enlarged. A 10x power means that you are magnifying something 10 times. Say you are looking at a tree that is 100m away. With a 10x binocular it would look ten times closer (or, only 10m away). The greater the power, the smaller the field of view, and in general the lower the brightness of the image. Occular : The Occular lens is the lens that is closest to your eyes when you hold a pair of binoculars up to look through (the smallest lens). Objective Lens : The objective lens is the lens at the other end (the larger lens). It's purpose is to gather light from a sharply focused image of a distant subject. The larger the objective, the more light it gathers, all else being equal. Conversely, the smaller the objective, the lighter weight and more compact the unit will be - an important factor in back packing, etc. Exit Puple : The most important number associated with binoculars is actually the exit puple It is the diameter of the beam (in mm) that leaves the eyepiece. The larger the exit pupil, the brighter the image. and the better they are for viewing things in low light situations (like dawn or dusk). The exit pupil is calculated by dividing the diameter of the objective lens by the power (objective diameter/power). Exit pupils of 6-7mm are generally found in "night glasses, while exit pupils of 4-5mm are found in general purpose binoculars. Relative Brightness : The term relative brightness refers to how much light a binocular gathers. It is calculated by squaring the exit pupil (objective diameter/power)². If the optics are fully-coated the relative brightness is increased by 50%. Field of View : Field of view is the width of the the viewing area seen through the binoculars - it decreases as magnification increases. It is expressed in degrees and also in feet. A 7x50 binocular may include 7.1º and include 375 feet at 100 yards. Porro-Prism : Binoculars with porro-prisms have the traditional binocular shape with the eyepiece offset from the objective lenses on each side. Roof prisms : Roof Prism binoculars feature in-line optics, and are lighter, more compact, but generally cost more. Lens Coating : Lenses can be coated to increase the transmission of light. Fully-coated (FC) means all the air-glass surfaces are coated. Multi-coated (MC) means that one or more surfaces, of one or more lenses, have been coated with multiple layers. Fully Multiple-coated (FMC) means that all air-glass surfaces have multiple layers of coating. Uncoated glass will waste about 6% of all the light that strikes it , meaning that an uncoated binocular will throw away over half the light coming in to an objective.

description: Allows you to edit and delete records in any SQLite database on your phone. For root users, lists all installed apps which have local internal databases. You can then select an app and edit any of its databases. Fully integrated with Root Explorer. When browsing files in Root Explorer, selecting a database file automatically launches this app instead of the database viewer that is built into Root Explorer. Non-root users can browse and edit databases on the SD card. Data is displayed in a smooth scrollable grid and records can be filtered on any field value. To quickly get to regularly accessed databases you can either add them to the bookmarks list or look on the recently accessed tab.
release_text: v2.1.1 • Improved compatibility with Android L preview • Various bug fixes

description: Spades is a fun trick-taking card game like Hearts, Euchre & Canasta, but this Multiplayer card game is played in 2 player teams which adds a total new element of strategy. Hardwood Spades Free breathes new life into your favorite spades card game with excellent graphics and soothing environments. If you're new to Spades, don't worry you can find how to play tutorials. If you are familiar with Bridge, spades is much less complicated and easy to play but is similar. Hardwood Spades has the strategy aspects of a Texas Hold’em Poker game but with partners which really adds some new and fun gameplay. And it has luck elements of Slot games all with quality artwork and pleasant background sounds and background that take on a mini vacation. ★★★★★ "Great game I'm a big spades player an this game is awesome!♥" -Phenomenal W Play online spades with players from across the internet or with family and friends. You can even post your winnings to Facebook for all your friends to see. Spades game variations included in Hardwood Spades Free offline and Multiplayer live spades modes with multiple levels of difficulty: * Partnership Spades (traditional) * Partnership - Suicide * Partnership - Mirrors * Individual Spades * Individual -Mirror * Individual-Cutthroat * Individual -Cutthroat Mirror Online Multiplayer Spades social games are free. Also check out our other Hardwood online card and boardgames: Hardwood Euchre - Jacks are Trump in this trick taking game. Hardwood Hearts - A great trick taking game where the goal is to take the least amount of points. Hardwood Backgammon - Who can move their men to safety 1st? & Video Poker Duel - Play competitive video poker just like you'd find in a casino. If you also like some solitude, all of our games can be played as single player with multiple difficulty levels. But for the ultimate single player experience, check out our game Hardwood Solitaire IV available here on google play.

★ Top Developer (awarded 2013) ★ Same as our “Hearts Free”, but without advertising! AI Factory Hearts brings this classic and popular 4-player trick-taking card game to the Android market. Created to the same high standard as the rest of our games, AI Factory Hearts provides classy graphics, super smooth gameplay, highly scalable difficulty & much more. Hearts has never been so good! Hearts is also known under a number of different names around the world, including Chase the Lady and Rickety Kate, and is similar to the game Black Lady. In Turkey the game is called Queen of Spades, and in India it is known as Black Queen. Featuring: - Full Hearts play, with optional Jack of Diamonds rule - Card passing options, including alternating (Left, Right, Across, No Pass) - 18 CPU Hearts players of varying skill (beginner to expert) - Choose which characters to play against! - Choose between 3 decks of cards and 5 backgrounds (or use your own photo!) - User and CPU player stats! - Undo & Hints - Hearts Rules & Help - Designed for both Tablet and Phone **Note that when upgrading from the Free version, the User/CPU player stats (only) are retained. To do this the game needs to read from your SD card when it starts for the first time, so please make sure the SD card is available and not connected to your PC**

description: Do you travel in Germany? Have you seen the license plates of other cars and wondered where they are from? Now you will know! Brush up on your geography skills at the same time! Features Find the name and location of a city when you only know the city letters Browse cities by name in a list and find the location on a map

fanatix cricket – Powered by ESPNcricinfo is the new social mobile app for cricket lovers! fanatix, the leading social network for sports fans, has teamed up with the world’s #1 digital cricket brand - ESPNcricinfo - to give you a new way to come together with friends and other fans to follow and debate the matches, players and news of the moment. The app includes ESPNcricinfo’s peerless live cricket commentary along with news, blogs, images, video and social media content from the all the top players, teams and websites all over the globe. You can customise your cricket experience and create a personalised stream that delivers the most up to date news and views from the opinion makers you like to follow. When your team is in action, check in to the match to discuss the game with friends in private group chats called Huddles. Alternatively, join a public Hosted Huddle to chat with fans from Facebook, Twitter, Google+ or ESPNcricinfo all in one place, all connected by the live game. With real-time stats, score updates and ESPNcricinfo ball-by-ball summaries sitting alongside your thoughts on play as it unfolds, fanatix cricket is the definitive live social mobile experience for cricket fans. Download and enjoy!

I noticed that all blocking apps are too complicated for such a simple task so I decided to create this one based in iOS do not disturb. Does not work on some devices, you just have to do a test. Options: - Enable/Disable - Block all calls - Block private/unknown/anonymous/hidden numbers - Block numbers not in contact list - Block numbers not in favorite contacts (not on trial) - Outgoing call confirmation - Individual contacts blacklist. (readonly on trial) Low memory footprint and minimal blocking delay. The calls will be forwarded to voicemail if ‘Call forwarding settings’ are configured or else will be simply blocked. Under development: Make better use of the available space on tablets Call logs Next: SMS blocking Permissions explained: Note that no internet access is required! Contacts/Calendar read your contacts - android.permission.READ_CONTACTS modify your contacts - android.permission.WRITE_CONTACTS To read/set the flag Send to voicemail Phone directly call phone numbers - android.permission.CALL_PHONE reroute outgoing calls - android.permission.PROCESS_OUTGOING_CALLS To the Call confirmatiom dialog Device ID & call information read phone status and identity - android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE Identify when receiving a call so that can be blocked In-app purchases - com.android.vending.BILLING To unblock all funcionality

A group of expedition exploring in the North Pole and they meet a huge avalanche. Our expedition heroes have to run ahead of the relentless avalanche and also fling off the awakened giant snowberg monster which was deep sleeping in the cave! Play as 7 different expedition members in the game. Scientist, explorers, soldiers, Ninja, and a MONSTER in cage! (What?... you didn’t expect me to reveal everything, did you?) O aplicativo "Token Empresa" oferece para você, que é correntista Pessoa Jurídica do Banco Santander no Brasil, mais uma forma de obter os códigos numéricos de segurança para movimentar a conta da sua empresa, de maneira prática e rápida. Este aplicativo está disponível apenas em Português. Apresenta diferentes códigos numéricos (senhas dinâmicas e temporárias) cada vez que é acessado - diretamente pelo seu celular - sem a necessidade de qualquer outro dispositivo, oferecendo mais garantia às transações financeiras. Para saber mais, acesse www.santander.com.br/mtoken ou consulte o Manual de Instruções disponível no Internet Banking Empresarial > menu Administrativo no endereço www.santanderempresarial.com.br. The application "Token Company" offers for you, which is accountholder Corporate Banco Santander in Brazil, one more way to get the security code numbers for the account of your company, in a practical and fast. This application is only available in Portuguese. Presents different numerical codes (dynamic passwords and temporary) each time it is accessed - directly from your phone - without the need for any other device, offering more security to financial transactions. To learn more, visit www.santander.com.br / mtoken or see the User Manual available on the Internet Business Banking> Administration menu in the address www.santanderempresarial.com.br.

description: The Psychic Tarot for the Heart Oracle Cards by John Holland was created to assist and guide you in matters of the heart, especially the different relationships in your life. Relationships of all kinds are really about you! They will often reflect back what you need to see and the lessons you need to learn. By using this deck and the techniques that psychic medium John Holland imparts, along with the wisdom of the tarot, you’ll begin to understand and look at relationships — past, present, and future — with an intuitive eye. This deck is not just for lovers! These cards will resonate with anyone and add clarity around all types of relationships, including the most important one of all . . . the relationship with your self. With The Psychic Tarot for the Heart Oracle Cards app you can: - Give readings anywhere, anytime on your Android device - Choose between 5 different card reading methods - Save and load your readings for review at any time - E-mail readings to friends - Flip cards over to read the full meaning of each card - Review the entire deck of cards in Browse mode About the Author Internationally renowned psychic medium John Holland has been lecturing, teaching, demonstrating, and reading for private clients for more than 18 years. He believes passionately that once the physical body dies, our spirit lives on. He has dedicated his life to his own spiritual development and teaching, as well as offering peace and comfort during times of loss and bereavement. “To see a group of students walk out of one of my workshops inspired, awakened, motivated, and energized is all the gratitude that I need,” John says. “If I somehow help them to start their own journey, then I’ve done my job.” Author of the bestsellers Power of the Soul, Born Knowing, Psychic Navigator, and 101 Ways to Jump-Start Your Intuition, John also hosts his own weekly radio show on Hay House Radio, Spirit Connections. He has become a familiar face on TV on programs such as the A&E special Mediums—We See Dead People, as well as appearing as a psychic authority on the History Channel’s Psychic History. John’s story was originally profiled on CBS’s Unsolved Mysteries. For further information about John, to find out about his series of workshops and other events, or to sign up for his free email newsletter, visit: www.johnholland.com Official Hay House licensed App: www.hayhouse.com

**ATTENTION** Installation problems? Please read below. What is a doo-dad? A doo-dad is a widget that sole purpose is to add a little bling to your screen without having to change your background or theme. Do you have the perfect wallpaper or theme but it is missing some little something to set it off? That's where doo-dads come in. Doo-dads come in various sizes and put very little drain on your battery. To Install: 1. Purchase, download and install 2. Go to blank area on home screen and long hold (press and hold) 3. When menu comes up select Widgets 4. Look for the doo-dad you installed and select it Your doo-dad should appear on the screen. If you would like to move it around just press and long hold until you see the doo-dad increase in size then move it to where you want it. Everybody's screen needs a doo-dad! Enjoy! keywords: American, eagle, flag, doo-dads, doodads, dark matter lab

Funny talking cats, super app with option of live wallpaper. The cats repeat everything you say in a funny voice and add a funny comment from themselves. The cats are very talented. The talking cats play beautiful music on the instruments. They play fantastic drums, keyboard, classical and electric guitar, accordion, piano, cello. The cats have help playing the instruments: funny hamsters and puppy. The talking cats adore when you stroke them on the back. They squint their eyes and purr happily. Touch the cat's belly and it will say you something funny. At night the cats are sleeping and snoring. If you like the cats, you can set them as a wallpaper. In case of any problems with the effect of talking cats, instead of giving us the negative opinion, please send us an e-mail and review briefly the problem. It will help us to solve it in the next updates of app. Application with talking cats is free but contains ads in settings of the wallpaper and inside app. Revenue from advertising will help us to create new attractive wallpapers and applications. All permissions are required only for advertising and are supported by trusted vendors.

Please try out new puzzle game - Splitsum https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.jssapps.splitsum WORDGENUITY® SUPER WORD JUMBLE is a multi-word jumble type game. Several letters are given and the goal is to reveal the words in the puzzle using the letters provided. To help you with each puzzle a group and a more specific topic are provided. Depending on your knowledge of the topic you may be able to guess what some of the words are. For the rest of the words use the letters provided. If you get stuck use a hint. Each hint will reveal the next letter in each of the words. If you are still stuck use more hints. Hints are accumulated by solving puzzles without using a hint. All answers are one word only and ten letters or less. So if, for example, a topic involves U.S. states you can be sure states with multiple words in their name are not in the puzzle. The lite version contains 100 puzzles with hundreds of words to unscramble. You are given 20 hints to get started. The full version contains 300 puzzles with almost 2000 words to unscramble. The full version also allows for an unlimited number of hints. If you enjoy word jumbles, word searches, word scrambles, puzzles, anagrams, crosswords or other fun, free word games then please give Wordgenuity® SWJ a try! Also please check out our Google+ page at: https://plus.google.com/u/0/b/111188384974678543797/111188384974678543797/posts/p/pub Enjoy! KW: Anagrams, Fun with words, Word Jumble, Word Scramble, Word Search, Crosswords.
release_text: Resolved an issue where the correct puzzle was not always being displayed

description: Este é um jogo de passatempo que contém 27 fases e vários níveis de dificuldade. Além de testar o raciocínio e a agilidade, tem como objetivo divertir os jogadores. Para passar de fase, é necessário ter rapidez e boa percepção para matar os monstros que aparecerão nos buracos, e alcançar o valor de pontos estipulado. Em algumas fases será necessário bater mais de uma vez no mesmo monstro para matá-lo e aumentar a pontuação. Ao final de cada nível, aparecerá o Monster Crush. Para prosseguir no jogo, você terá que matá-lo. Para aumentar o tempo, aparecerão nos buracos alguns relógios, cada um que for pego, dará 5 segundos a mais no tempo do jogo. Também aparecerão cubos de gelo, que ao congelarão os monstros que estiverem fora dos buracos no momento em que forem tocados. Tenha cuidado, pois sairão dos buracos algumas bombas, que ao serem tocadas explodirão, tendo o jogador que repetir a fase. Indicado para todas as idades. Trabalha a agilidade e atenção This is a hobby that game contains 27 stages and various difficulty levels. Besides testing reasoning and agility, aims to entertain the players.    To complete a level, you must have speed and good perception to kill the monsters that appear in the holes, and achieve value stipulated points. In some stages you will need to hit more than once in the same monster to kill it and increase the score. At the end of each level, Monster Crush appears. To proceed further, you will have to kill him.   To increase the time, holes appear in some watches, each is caught, give you 5 seconds more game time. Also appear cubes of ice, which will freeze the monsters that are out of the holes when they are touched. Be careful as some pumps come out of the holes, which when touched explode, taking the player to repeat the phase. Suitable for all ages. Works agility and attention

A baby brings a lot of joy as well as a lot of responsibility and duties with it. Feeding, wrapping diapers, sleeping, medical care, etc. .. In our hectic world it is not always easy to keep an overview. Baby Log will help you here. By simply logging the most important activities you will get a clear history and statistics. - timer, history, statistics and a graphical overview - Logging: breastfeeding left / right (or pumping), feeding bottle / solid food, sleep, diapers, medicine - easy creation of new entries (of course manual additions possible) - editing and deleting entries - optional comments for each entry possible - statistics for each logged activity as well as any time period possible - Homescreen widgets (4x1, 3x1, 2x1) for quick logging (also supported on lockscreen with Android 4.2 and higher) - Online synchronization of all entries between multiple devices - Import / Export data in CSV format - light and dark color theme - in app help - a lot of options concerning usability and data to display Do you have questions, troubles or suggestions please leave us a comment on our website: http://www.bartslab.com/index.php/android-apps/baby-log Privacy Notice: We take personal data privacy VERY serious and no data is accessed until it is really needed for a feature. Data exchange takes place ONLY in the purpose of the synchronization feature. For transfer an encrypted transport protocol is used and NO personal related data (like an email address) are ever sent. Under NO circumstances will the data be sold or passed on to third parties for any other reason! Explanation of used Permissions: control vibration - vibration feature when starting / stopping the timer modify or delete the contents of your USB storage read the contents of your USB storage - CSV data file export / import add or remove accounts create accounts and set passwords find accounts on the device toggle sync on and off - scheduled data synchronisation using the android account manager (optimizing the battery consumption) full network access - send / receive synchronisation data Tags: baby log protocol breastfeeding breast feeding diaper sleep timer stopper

description: 無印良品でのお買い物がもっと便利になるアプリ「MUJI passport」。 お買い物をしたりお店にチェックインするとMUJIマイルが貯まり、マイルに応じたポイントなどのサプライズプレゼントが届きます。また、商品検索機能で、気になる商品や在庫状況を簡単に検索できます。 ＜パスポート機能＞ 全国の無印良品でお買い物の際にMUJI passportのご提示、ネットストアでのお買い物、店舗へのチェックイン、商品への口コミ投稿などでMUJIマイルが貯まります。 貯まったマイルに応じてお買い物で使えるMUJI ショッピングポイントなどをプレゼント。 また、無印良品週間週間中には、ご優待価格でお買い物いただけるクーポンが届きます。 ＜商品検索機能＞ 欲しい商品の各店舗在庫を検索できるショッピングガイド機能も搭載。今いる場所から、欲しい商品の在庫がある最も近い店舗をご案内します。 ＜その他の機能＞ ★お誕生日特典 お誕生日月のお買い物はMUJIマイル2倍などの特典があります。 ★ご優待価格クーポンをプレゼント 無印良品週間など、ご優待価格でお買い物いただけるクーポンが届きます。 ★店舗検索機能 日本国内の無印良品店舗を検索できます。また、チェックイン機能でマイルを獲得できます。 ----------------- アプリケーションに対するご意見、ご要望等は、こちら（ http://www.muji.net/contact/ ）の窓口でお受けしております。今後のアプリケーション改善に向け、ご意見をお待ちしております。

app_name: BIDI: lector QR y de barras
description: Con el nuevo BIDI tienes un personal shopper en tu bolsillo para que consigas la información que buscas. Escanea cualquier código QR o el código de barras de cualquier producto para descubrir información adicional del producto e interactuar con la marca y otros usuarios. Filtrado por tus gustos y preferencias, accederás a la selección de descuentos y ofertas que hemos seleccionado especialmente para ti y el contenido de los productos que más te gusta. Con el servicio eScan, prestado por Scanbuy y AECOC, cuando escaneas el código de barras de un producto te mostramos: - La información que la marca ofrece de ese producto - Las opiniones y comentarios de otros consumidores - Información de marketing más relevante - Cupones, si estuvieran disponibles Otras formas en las que BIDI puede ayudarte: - Guardamos tu historial de escaneo en Mis Escaneos - Si sincronizas BIDI con Facebook podrás compartir tus productos favoritos con tus amigos - Crear tu propio código QR desde la app para que otros puedan guardar tu contacto simplemente escaneando tu código --------------------------------------------- KEYWORDS: Escaneo, escanear, escáner, lector de códigos, código QR, cupones, descuentos, opiniones, ofertas, código de barras, GS1, notificaciones, eScan With the new BIDI you have a personal shopper in your pocket so you get the information you seek. Scan any QR code or barcode of any product to find additional product information and interact with the brand and users. Filter results by your tastes and preferences will direct you to the selection of discounts and offers we have selected specially for you and the content of the products that you like. With the eScan service, provided by Scanbuy and AECOC, when you scan the barcode of a product we show: - The information that the brand offers that product - The views and opinions of other consumers - More relevant marketing information - Coupons, if available Other ways you can help BIDI: - We keep your history Scan My Scans - If you synchronize with Facebook BIDI can share your favorite products with friends - Create your own QR code from the app so that others can save your contacts by simply scanning your code --------------------------------------------- KEYWORDS: Scan, scan, scanner, code reader, QR codes, coupons, discounts, reviews, deals, barcode, GS1, notifications, eScan
release_text: Anímate a descubrir la nueva BIDI: - Fantásticos descuentos que filtramos para ti de acuerdo a tus preferencias entre miles de promociones que recibimos - Hay un nuevo buzón de Mensajes en el que recibirás ofertas y contenido especialmente seleccionado para ti de acuerdo a tus preferencias - Actualización del diseño para ayudarte a encontrar lo que más te gusta - Solución de pequeños errores y otras mejoras

description: Do you have TEXT documents on your phone that you don't want others to see? Confidential? Want to password protect them? Then ‘TEXT Lock’ is the solution! Use the simple user interface and quickly secure your TEXT documents The first screen shows all the TEXT documents you have on the SD (memory) card You can use the TEXT Lock file explorer by selecting the list icon and manually exploring the SD (memory) card to find documents to secure. Using the file explorer you can also add, edit, delete, copy, past and move files, zip and share files TO SECURE TEXT DOCUMENTS Long click / tap on the document you wish to protect and select 'Encrypt' Once encrypted the icon of the document will be shown as a padlock To view the file you must decrypt the document first by long click / tap on the document and select 'Decrypt' Ad free! Other features: * Ad free * User friendly interface * Secure TEXT documents using AES encryption * Using file explorer add, edit, delete, copy, past and move files, zip and share files This is a BETA release, many more features coming soon PLEASE BACKUP YOUR DOCUMENTS TO YOUR PC BEFORE USING THIS APPLICATION Keywords: TEXT, TEXT secure, lock, hide, document security For any queries / problems email us at support@javamonkeyltd.com

This is the Periodic Table of the Elements application. Ideal for students and investigators who need to access to an element's information in a fast and easy way! You just have to click on element's name and the next information will be displayed: - Name - Symbol - Group and Period - Element category - Atomic weight - Atomic number - Electron configuration - Electron per shell - Valence Available in English, French, Italian, Portuguese and Spanish.

description: Interactive Magical Fantasy Puzzles & Memory Match Promote Smart & Creative Play! Puzzles Include Dragons, Unicorns, Fairies, & More - Gorgeous Graphics! Stimulate Imagination & Spatial Thinking Skills with Puzzle Pieces that Move Puzzles inspire imagination and promote spatial thinking skills in children. These six fantasy “Happy Ever After” flying puzzles and memory matching games will delight your children while also engaging your kids in smart play. Kids will first choose from 6 fantasy worlds including wizards, fairies, mermaids, angels, unicorns and dragons. Each puzzle has two levels - identify by color and shape. Kids will tap the puzzle pieces and catch them as they move across the screen putting the correct piece into each flying silhouette. When kids successfully complete a puzzle, it sets off festive fireworks and an extra game to win more points. Kids will play additional games like pop the flowers or tap the turtles to gain bonus points. Each character in the puzzle has his or her own unique voice. Memory matching games are excellent for kids’ development and super fun to play! Features inside Happy Ever After - Unicorns, Fairies, Angels, Dragons, Mermaids & Wizards - All in One Fantasy Worlds ✔ Gorgeous Graphics & Sound Effects when Moving Puzzles Pieces ✔ Complete the fantasy puzzle and fireworks explode ✔ Touch and tap on the graphics to win extra points - cool popping games & memory matching! What's inside Happy Ever After - Unicorns, Fairies, Angels, Dragons, Mermaids & Wizards - All in One Fantasy Worlds ✔ 6 Interactive fantasy puzzles with moving pieces & memory matching games ✔ 2 levels for every puzzle - place by color and by shape ✔ Fantasy puzzles include wizards, mermaids, fairies, dragons & more ABOUT TabTale With over 400 million downloads and growing, TabTale has established itself as the creator of pioneering virtual adventures that kids and parents love. We lovingly produce interactive e-books, games, and educational experiences for children. Search “TabTale” on Google Play and discover more incredible apps. Visit us: http://www.tabtale.com/ Google Plus: https://plus.google.com/+Tabtale/posts Like us: http://www.facebook.com/TabTale Follow us:@Tabtale Watch us: http://www.youtube.com/iTabtale CONTACT US Let us know what you think! Questions? Suggestions? Technical Support? Contact us 24/7 at WeCare@TabTale.com. IMPORTANT MESSAGE FOR PARENTS: * This App is free to play but certain in-game items may be purchased for real money. You may restrict in-app purchases by disabling them on your device. * By downloading this App you agree to TabTale’s Privacy Policy and Terms of Use at http://tabtale.com/privacy-policy/ and at http://tabtale.com/terms-of-use/ . description: Play the popular solitaire game 3 Pyramid Tripeaks for FREE! TriPeaks (also known as TriTowers, Triple Peaks, Three Peaks or Pyramid Solitaire) is an addicting solitaire card game that combines strategy and patience! Object of the game is to clear all the cards from the screen by placing cards that are one higher or one lower on the master deck. Jokers can be used for any value. As soon as a row of cards has been removed new cards will be added into play. Experience the magic of the pyramids in the free solitaire Tripeaks game. ** HUGE Update 6/10/2015 ** The game has been redone and now features a lot of requested features as well as graphical and performance enhancements. In addition to remaking the original we are hard at work on an Adventure game mode as well as some other goodies! What's new? -New Pyramid with 52 levels -New Golden Card collection game mode -New Spider web trap cards -New Beetles to fight -Adjusted pricing for gates (cheaper) -Adjusted coins earned for games (more consistent) -Adjusted diamonds earned for games (you earn more per win) Please keep checking back and keep your eye out for notifications about the latest releases! *Powered by Dolby® on supported devices*

Army Airplane Flight Simulator 3D is an awesome 3D Army Plane Simulator Flying Game. Do you have it in you to win the war? Complete all 20 levels and find out!

A simple Analogue Clock which shows the date and time, has three editable hotspots and the colours of the shapes can be changed You MUST have UCCW 2.1.2 or higher installed on your device or this skin WILL NOT work. ****This skin will only appear in UCCW after you place a widget on your homescreen. It does not appear in your app drawer or if you open UCCW from your app drawer**** Three Hotspots available (See Picture) - 1. Open Calendar App 2. Open Alarm Clock App 3. Open UCCW Editor Each Hotspot can be assigned to a different app/shortcut Shapes 1-12 correspond to the time Shape 13 - Outer ring Shape 14 - Date box The colours of each of these shapes can be changed as well as the Date colour Adding skin to your homescreen 1. Add a 2x2 (Can be as large as 3x3 or 4x4) UCCW widget to your homescreen by long pressing the homescreen or browsing widgets in app drawer 2. Select Date Clock from UCCW menu 3. Resize before hitting "Touch Here" (This is so that the Hotspots will be correctly aligned) 4. Hit "Touch Here" to load the skin If you have any problems or queries please do not hesitate to email me Enjoy and thank you :o) Circle me on Google+ for more Bacon - http://goo.gl/BqSybX

Relax with undersea scene, many fishes swimming over coral reefs. You can select number from 0 to 30 fishes appear on screen random among 30 beautiful sea fishes. - Touch move left/right : Move coral background. - Long touch move left/right : Replace coral background. (all 5 coral backgrounds). - Touch move from upper to under of the fish : Magic disappear the fish. (the fishes will appear untill Double touch). - Touch move from under to upper of the fish : Magic all fishes on screen become the fish. - Touch move from bottom screen up : increase number fish. - Touch move from top screen down : decrease number fish. - Double touch : Reset. All fishes can appear. - Touch on top screen : Feeding fish. - Touch fish : The fish react. - Touch conner bottom left : on/off sound. TelegramSpeak is a complement to Telegram. Translate to voice messages received. Once configured not need to touch anything to hear the messages. You can, for example cycling while listening (at your own risk). Before using TelegramSpeak need: -Have Telegram installed. -Have installed a speech synthesizer (TTS). Most devices have it by default, if not is your case I put a link below to download it. -Once installed TelegramSpeak must authorize the service. Turn On TelegramSpeak service in the accessibility window. This window is displayed the first time you use TelegramSpeak. Now you can start, there are three modes: -Silence: You use Telegram as usual, without speaking. -Contact only: Discreet Mode, just says contact, and group if applicable. -Contact and message: It tells you the name, group if applicable, and the message content. To function properly you must turn off the screen of the device. Finally, if you like the app you can give 5 stars, je je. ... Even can make a donation from the Extensions Menu. To download a TTS : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.svox.langpack.installer

rymdkapsel is a meditative strategy game set in space. Take on the challenge of building the best possible station by commanding your minions and exploring the galaxy around you. Imagine a strategy game where you don't have to worry about selecting units or mounting attacks on your enemies, but rather can focus on building the best base possible. That's what rymdkapsel is all about. "Rymdkapsel feels tailor-made for iOS in both form and function, and its elegant, subtle constituent parts nest within one another as neatly as its four-block tetrominos snap together along a space station corridor." - 5/5 stars, Joseph Leray, toucharcade.com "Some games nearly make me miss my subway stop. Some games tempt me to keep on playing them while I'm walking down the street. This is one of them." - Stephen Totilo, kotaku.com "The game punishes the greedy, and rewards the prudent. If you’re attentive, you’ll notice that there’s actually a happy medium between the two: optimal efficiency." - Ryan Rigney, wired.co.uk "Rymdkapsel combines spatial puzzling, tower defence and base-building into a brilliantly coherent and stylish whole." - Christian Donlan, eurogamer.net
release_text: Two new game modes, four new monoliths, seven new achievements, and various bug fixes and performance improvements.

description: The weather right in your pocket - as simple as it can get. With brilliant graphics and simple interface you can always stay in touch with the weather, anywhere in the world. Features: - Simple, intuitive interface for the basic weather parameters: air temperature, pressure, relative humidity and general weather outlook; - Manual marker to follow the pressure changes; - Timely updates; - Global coverage. With DigiStation you simply get the significant weather information right when you need it! Attention! This is a home screen widget - to use it, after installing the application, long-press on a free area of your home screen and select from the menu the entry that allows you to add a widget. Choose either of the two DigiStation versions: normal or large. Then select your preferred location, language and units.

Features: - 100% FREE! - Works great on tablets! - Over 100 different categories - Engaging word search puzzles - Dynamically generated puzzles; you'll never get the same one twice - Easy, Medium, Hard, and Expert difficulty modes - Excellent graphics - Fast loading with Auto-Save feature - Game statistics and a global high score system - Many bonuses to collect, including secret words on Hard and Expert modes - Fun sound effects
release_text: Version 2.3: - Over 25 new categories to play! Version 2.2: - Two new game play modes: First Letter Only and Keep It Going - Unlockable achievements for solving puzzles quickly, finding lots of words, and more!

description: Attention: HanWriting is being integrated with MultiLing. Please install MultiLing + HanWriting Plugin instead of this version. New improvement will only be available on MultiLing. 漢書正在與MultiLing結合。請安装MultiLing + HanWriting plugin. 識別率改善在MultiLing. 中 (简体/繁體) / 日本語 / 韓한국어 / 英 / 粵 / 香港字 手寫+拼音+注音+語音 輸入法 Chinese / Japanese kana / Korean hangul / English / Cantonese Handwriting recognition + Pinyin + Zhuyin (bopomofo)+ keyboard + voice input ★★★★★★★★ Please visit web page & read prior installation! 安裝前，請訪問開發者的網頁，讀清楚説明! ㈠偏旁找字 身→射→謝/麝, 豊→體, 男→嬲, 每→敏→繁瀪, 匊→鞠 ㈡同音轉換 孑孓→解決，乞林→麒麟，专幻→轉換，见判→鍵盤 ㈢插拼音 y用→應用，s別→識別，yj香→鬱金香 ㈣插注音 活ㄉ→活動，反ㄉ→反對，ㄩㄐ香→鬱金香 ㈤簡繁轉換 体→體，龙→龍，专→转→轉… ㈥合字 麻鬼→魔，車甫→輔，分手→掰 ㈦大字符/詞庫

Isabelle Palmer, American Girl’s Girl of the Year 2014, is an inspired dancer living in Washington, D.C. Isabelle is excited to begin at Anna Hart School of the Arts, where her older sister, Jade, has been studying ballet. Jade and the other girls at school are amazing dancers, and Isabelle worries that she won’t be able to keep up! Help Isabelle improve her ballet skills by playing Isabelle Dance Studio. Tap the stars so that Isabelle will reach and leap to keep them in the air. Touch stars to earn points. Let stars hit gems to fill up the starburst meter and unlock its special power. Tap megastars for more points and powers, but don’t touch the black pearl! If you do, you’ll have to start over. Remember, practice makes perfect! To learn more about Isabelle, or to discover more fun games and activities, visit www.americangirl.com/play/girl-of-the-year/ Game Features •Beautiful graphics •Multiple backgrounds •Endless play

Turn on Portable Wi-Fi hotspot Improve your mobile computing experience. Simple and fast. **Before running the application configuration is required. SETTING: Settings->More..->Tethering & portable hotspot->Set up Wi-Fi hotspot https://support.google.com/android/answer/182134 Rename or secure your portable hotspot You can change the name of your phone's Wi-Fi network name (SSID) and secure its Wi-Fi network when it's acting as a portable hotspot. Go to Settings > Wireless & networks > More > Tethering & portable hotspot. Make sure Portable Wi-Fi hotspot is checked. Touch Configure Wi-Fi hotspot. The Configure Wi-Fi hotspot dialog opens. Set your name and security options as follows: Change the Network TO USE: Just touch Portable Wi-Fi hotspot icon on / off *Subscribing to smartphone data plan is needed for users of some telecommunication firms.

description: Povezivanje na HotSpot Uporabom HotSpot aplikacije olakšava se povezivanje na HotSpot lokacije. U aplikaciji na statusnom ekranu unosi se HotSpot korisničko ime i zaporka te pritiskom na tipku „Prijavi se“ započinje povezivanje na HotSpot. Po prvoj uspješnoj prijavi podaci se pamte kako bi se olakšalo sljedeće povezivanje. Automatsko povezivanje na HotSpot Kako bi uporaba HotSpot usluge bila što lakša, aplikacija ima mogućnost automatskog povezivanja na HotSpot lokacije. Nakon unosa korisničkih podataka u postavkama aplikacije potrebno je uključiti opciju automatskog povezivanja na HotSpot. Uključenjem ove opcije aplikacija se pokušava spojiti na HotSpot ako je u blizini pronađena HotSpot lokacija, odnosno ako je dostupna HotSpot bežična mreža. HotSpot aplikacija treba biti uključena kako bi automatska prijava ispravno funkcionirala, tj. ako aplikacija radi u pozadini, automatsko spajanje na HotSpot neće raditi, već je potrebno uključiti aplikaciju. Automatsko podešavanje podataka za T-Mobile korisnike T-Mobile korisnicima kojima je omogućeno otvaranje HotSpot korisničkih podataka pojednostavljuje se dohvaćanje i upisivanje podataka u aplikaciju jer aplikacija odrađuje akcije dohvaćanja, unosa te prijave na HotSpot s korisničkim podacima, time znatno ubrzavajući i pojednostavljujući proces prijave na HotSpot! Aplikacija u pozadini šalje SMS-poruku na odredište 13526, čita podatke primljene u dolaznoj SMS-poruci te ih unosi u postavke aplikacije i pokušava se spojiti na HotSpot. Kupnja SMS-vaučera Korisnici svih mobilnih operatera u Hrvatskoj mogu koristiti HotSpot uslugu kupnjom SMS-vaučera! HotSpot aplikacija brine se o cijelom procesu kupnje SMS-vaučera, odnosno aplikacija šalje SMS na odredište 818901, učitava podatke u postavke aplikacije iz primljene SMS-poruke te se povezuje na HotSpot! Pretraga i pronalazak HotSpot lokacija Pronalazak HotSpot lokacija u blizini od sada je iznimno jednostavan! Please kindly RATE & SHARE this App as it is free :-) Use Menu button for fast collapse of expanded lists, swipe horizontally to view images completely Like us on facebook : https://www.facebook.com/whitesofinfo Follow us on Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/whitesof Find our apps at : http://www.whitesof.com/apps The Physics Notes app is just physics running notes for students. The app will be aggregation of definitions and formulas for students in most systematically The app covers: 1) Basics of Physics 2) Units, dimensions and physical constants. 3) Motion in one, two three dimensions. 4) Laws of motion, Circular, Relative and projectile motion. 5) Friction, dynamics of rigid bodies. 6) Gravitation 7) Work, Energy and Power. 8) Conservation laws of energy 9) Momentum and Impulse 10) Collisions. 11) Properties of matter 12) Surface Energy and Surface tension 13) Kinetic theory of gases 14) Thermodynamics 15) Oscillations and Simple harmonic motion 15) Waves. and more topics to come. please send suggestions, and topics to add to contactus@whitesof.com

The best selection of free horoscopes and tarot card readings on Android! ★★★★★ Sheila B. “I have not found any horoscope or tarot reasons that was this right on. I love having the combo of horoscope and tarot in one reading. It is very accurate and follows the things going on in my life.” ★★★★★ Doreen M. “This app was so accurate i began reading it art the end off my day just to too make sure i wasn't influencing it. I also love the many areas of life that it covers and that some of the areas are shown a week at a time. Can recommend it for serious users.” WIDE VARIETY OF HOROSCOPES: Reading your daily horoscope is a great way to start the day, but it doesn't give you all the information you need. That's why we provide ten different types of horoscopes, covering everything from love and romance to career and money issues. Check them all out: Daily, Love, Chatty, Weekly, Monthly, Romance, Style, Career, Money, 2015 Annual Stop relying on random horoscopes made up by some software developer in their parent's basement. This app uses planetary positions to provide relevant and timely horoscopes. TAROT CARD READINGS: Looking for insight into a particular question or issue in your life? Tarot cards can help to explain your current situation and anticipate future events. In this app you get a free daily three card tarot reading. This is a personal tarot reading, not one for everyone sharing your zodiac sign. It allows you to select three cards, one for your Recent Past, one for your Current Situation and one for your Future Influences. DAILY OUTLOOK: Looking for a quick summary of some key issues in your life? With our simple 5 star system, you get individual ratings for your Money, Energy, Love and Mood outlook. LOVE COMPATIBILITY: Wondering who you are most compatible with today? Your daily forecast tells you which zodiac sign you are being drawn towards. CUSTOMIZATION: Once you install the app, you can set your zodiac sign and choose a stylish sun sign icon. Once set, your customized forecasts will be available every time you open the app. No need to navigate around trying to find your zodiac sign. VIEW ALL SIGNS: Interested in reading someone else's outlook for the day? You can quickly and easily view any of the 12 zodiac signs from within the app. Plus, you have the option to send your friend their forecast by email. SHARE YOUR OUTLOOK: Is there a forecast that resonates with you or is relevant to a situation you are currently in? You have the option to share it on Facebook and Twitter or send it to someone privately by email. ★★★★★ John M. “A rare horoscope app that is both accurate and applicable to both the trivial and consequential issues of daily life. Attractive and easy to use.” Please contact us with any questions or concerns using the feedback button within the app or by visiting: http://www.astrolis.com/contact Follow us on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/Astrolis @Astrolis

description: このアプリは、世界で最もセキュリティーレベルの高いと言われるメッセンジャーアプリ(Telegram)の初の日本語版クライアントアプリ、セキュリティーメッセンジャー(Secure MSG)です。 Telegramは元々、 ロシアのセキュリティ当局 や ＮＳＡ(アメリカ国家安全保障局) 等の政府の情報機関等からでもメッセージ内容を盗まれないように作成されたアプリです。 【セキュリティ】 サーバーに保存されたメッセージや個人情報は、世界最高峰の暗号化が行われ安全に保存されております。 しかもEnd to End機能を利用したシークレットチャットでは、端末同士を直接接続するためにサーバーにログインすらせずにチャットができるようになります。当然サーバーにはなんのログも残りません。 また自動的にアプリ内からもメッセージが削除できるようになっており全ての痕跡を消去することが可能です。 【その他特徴】 ・メッセージデータを最小化することでより高速に送受信可能です。 世界中にサーバーを設置しており最速の地域からデータを送受信することで最高速を担保しております。 ・最大200名迄グループチャットが可能です。 ・一度に１ギガまでのデータを送受信できます。 ・クラウドベースのため色々な端末からログインすることが可能です。 【補足事項】 ＊弊社はTelegram LLCのＡＰＩを利用して作成されたアプリです。 アプリ自体は本家のアプリプログラムを日本に翻訳したのみでまったく本家と同じサービスを提供しております。 １日で作成したアプリのために翻訳に不備がある可能性があります。 もし問題ございましたらご連絡いただければ幸いです。 ＊ドイツへの盗聴問題等の影響もあり、本家のtelegramは現在毎日450万以上のＤＬがあるようです。 ＊こちらのサービスの脆弱性を発見することができた場合には、Telegram LLCから約2000万円(20万ドル)が進呈されます。 現状誰も獲得できておりませんが、深刻な問題を発見したロシアの方に約1000万円(10万ドル)進呈した模様です。 ＊telegram LLCは非営利団体が運営しております。 ＊永久に無料です。 【参照記事】 http://roshianow.jp/science/2013/08/15/44575.html http://www.bloomberg.co.jp/news/123-N1I7CX6K50YF01.html http://www.socialnetworking.jp/?p=113166 http://jp.techcrunch.com/2014/02/25/20140224telegram-saw-8m-downloads-after-whatsapp-got-acquired/ ◎仕事関連のメッセージを送受信する場合は是非こちらをご利用することを推奨いたします。 Japanese version of the client application first messenger app is said to be a high security level of the world's most (Telegram), security Messenger this app is (Secure MSG). Telegram is created so as not to steal the message content information from any agency of the government NSA and security authorities originally, of Russia (U.S. National Security Agency) of , etc. It is an application was. [security] Personal information or messages that are stored on the server, has been securely stored encryption of the world's highest mountain is performed. And the secret chat using the End to End feature, chat will be able to without even log in to the server in order to connect a terminal directly to each other. What of the log does not remain on the server of course. In addition, it is possible to erase all traces of the message is adapted to be removed from within the app automatically. [Other Features] • You can send and receive faster by minimizing the message data. We have to ensure the fastest by sending and receiving data from the area of ​​the fastest has set up a server in the world. · 200 people is possible for up to a group chat. • You can send and receive data up to 1 giga at a time. · It is possible to log in from a terminal for a variety of cloud-based. [Additional Notes] * We are apps that have been created using the API of the Telegram LLC. Application itself provides the same services as the head family at all only translated into Japanese apps program of the head family. There may be a defect in the translation for the application that you created in the 1st. I am happy if you contact us if you have any problem then. * There is also the impact of such eavesdropping problem to Germany, there seems to be a DL of 4.5 million or more each day currently telegram of the head family. * If you were able to discover the vulnerability of the service of this place, will be awarded the ($ 200,000) about 20 million yen from Telegram LLC. Welcome to the easiest-to-use ringtone personalization application on the Android™ Market. Simply press your selection of one of the top 45 loudest ringtones ever. Then, press the play button to preview your very loud selection. Press the red "x" to go back to the loud ringtone choices or press the green check mark to: * Set the very loud ringtone to your default ringtone * Set the very loud ringtone to your notification sound * Set the very loud ringtone to your alarm * Set the very loud ringtone to a specific contact It's as easy as that! Best of all, its free! Any and all permissions are either for application performance or advertiser performance. KlearTones prides itself on never collecting or storing user data and uses spam free banner ads.

굿맘스 영어동요 도움말 굿맘스 영어동요 앱을 이용해 주셔서 감사합니다. 유아, 아동 어린이(키즈)를 위한 게임도 포함하고 있으니 많은 이용바랍니다. 신나고 재미있는 인기 영어동요와 함게 재미있는 단어퀴즈게임도 아이들과 함께 즐겨보세요. 또한 ABC 알파벳 익히기 및 뽀로로 비디오 시리즈도 볼 수 있습니다. 재미있는 그림과 발음듣기, 동요가사 싱크 기능 등 아이들이 어릴 때부터 자연스럽게 영어와 친해질 수 있습니다. 굿맘스 영어동요 앱은 다음과 같은 다양한 기능들을 제공합니다. 1. 영어동요 Play : 아이들의 감성을 발달시켜주는 밝고 재미있는 영어동요를 들려줍니다. 또한 가사가 표시되며 노래방기기 처럼 가사싱크 기능 및 단어학습기능을 제공하므로 듣는 재미 뿐만 아니라 영어단어 학습기능의 효과도 함께 만나실 수 있습니다. : 내 휴대폰에 저장된 mp3 파일들을 검색하고 즐겨찾기에 등록시켜 재생할 수 있는 미니 Music Player 기능도 함께 제공합니다. 2. ABC 알파벳 익히기 : 영어공부의 기초인 알파벳 익히기 기능을 제공합니다. 대표적인 단어를 그림과 함께 표현해 주며 듣기 기능도 제공하므로 정확한 발음과 함께 쉽고 재미있게 알파벳을 익힐 수 있습니다. 3. Quiz 기능 : 여러가지 단어들을 그림과 함께 표시되며 해당되는 단어를 선택하게 하는 Quiz 기능을 제공합니다. 엄마, 아빠와 함께 재미있는 단어 퀴즈를 풀면서 아이와 함께 즐거운 시간을 만들어 보세요. 4. View Video 기능 : 아이들이 좋아하는 뽀로로시리즈, 치로와 친구들 등의 유튜브 동영상들을 보여줍니다. 개별보기, 전체보기, 랜덤으로 보기 등의 기능들을 지원합니다. 5. Doddle 기능 제공(낙서장) : 일상 생활에서 생긴 재미있는 이야기, 귀여운 아이들의 이야기, 고민, 푸념 등 자유롭게 글을 올릴 수 있는 익명 낙서장 기능을 제공합니다. 본 앱에 대한 건의나 의견 등도 같이 올려 주세요. 굿맘스 수다방으로 이동할 수도 있습니다. 6. 퍼즐 맞추기 : 과일 및 동물, 계절 이미지를 퍼즐로 즐길 수 있으며, 촬영 또는 앨범의 사진도 추가할 수가 있습니다. 7. 알파벳 한글 쓰기 : 알파벳과 가나다, 한글자음, 한글모음 글자를 보고 따라쓸 수가 있습니다. 색상은 무지개 색깔과 검정, 흰색을 선택할 수 있으며, 다른색상도 선택이 가능하여 색칠놀이로도 즐길 수가 있습니다. 8. 숨어있는 기능 찾기 : 메인화면에는 재미있는 기능이 숨어 있습니다. ^^ 사랑스런 아이들과 즐거운 시간 보내시길 바라며, 개선점이나 또는 격려의 말씀 많이 부탁 드립니다. 문의 또는 건의 등에 대해서는 낙서장에 올려 주시거나 master@nanumintech.com 으로 메일 보내 주시면 감사하겠습니다. description: Thanks you very much for downloading and installing Cat Wrestling Live Wallpaper. It's a free HD live wallpaper which you'll enjoy using during Christmas & New Year holidays! But you can always set your own pictures folder! Also, please, see some other features available: * Show pictures from gallery * Show pictures from folder * Change picture by double tap * Change picture by time interval * Transition effect The scrolling depends behavior of the Home application. description: I was tired of all these scrollable and customizable widgets with their 96846+ options and focus-losing because I accidently scrolled. So I made my own. CalendarWidget is just a clean and simple widget for your android-calendar with just the options you need - Choose the calendars you want to display - Choose the number of events to display (depending on your resizing of the widget) - Choose the number of days which events are to display - Toggle display of location - Toggle transparent background (for better viewing depending on your wallpaper) - Invert the widget colors for bright wallpapers - English or german language (depends on phone-setting) If you find any errors or missing things, if you have ideas to improve CalendarWidget, feel free to send me an E-Mail: christian.stoecker.dev@gmail.com

description: The whole Wikipedia content in your device! Kiwix is an offline content reader which can be used for Wikipedia as well as other contents (Ubuntu documentation, WikiLeaks, WikiSource, WikiVoyage, etc). Once you have downloaded the content file (potentially very large), you don't need any connection to use it. Kiwix is a lightweight software reading ZIM files which you download and store on your device or external storage (SD card). Please check the instructions inside the App or on the website to learn more about available contents. Note: Kiwix is also available on regular computers (Windows, Mac, Linux).
