description: Welcome to the online mobile C++ tutorial! The purpose of this tutorial is to give a good understanding of the programming language C++ to any person that wants it. So what is C++? Why are so many programs written in C++? C++ is a third generation programming language. When computers were first invented, they were programmed with very simple, low-level commands. A programmer would design a program, then translate the program into a specific set of codes, known as machine language. These codes would be fed into a computer with switches, punch-cards, or primitive keypads. These programs were cumbersome to write, and very hard to debug. (Debugging is the act of removing mistakes in a program.) Machine code is considered the first generation of programming languages. This application helps the user to get basic knowledge about C++ language. It provides six chapter namely: *Computer Hardware *Programs: Instructions in the Computer *Operating Systems *Why have high-level languages? *C++ development environment *Sequence (PDF of chapter) *Iteration (PDF of chapter) *Selection (PDF of chapter) *Simple use of files *Functions *Arrays *Programs with functions and arrays *Standard algorithms *Tools *Design and documentation *Enum, Struct, and Union *Examples using structs *Bits and pieces *Beginners' Class *Dynamic data and pointers *Collections of data *A World of Interacting Objects *Intermediate class *Two more - trees *Templates *Exceptions *Example: Supermarket *Design and documentation: 2 *The Power of Inheritance and Polymorphism *Reusable designs *Frameworks for understanding It cover major part of C++ programming language and also it will very useful for the fresher as well as for Job seekers for interview. C++ is a statically typed, free-form, multi-paradigm, compiled, general-purpose programming language. It is regarded as an intermediate-level language, as it comprises a combination of both high-level and low-level language features. It was developed by Bjarne Stroustrup starting in 1979 at Bell Labs as an enhancement to the C language. Originally named C with Classes, the language was renamed C++ in 1983, as a pun involving the increment operator. C++ is one of the most popular programming languages with application domains including systems software, application software, device drivers, embedded software, high-performance server and client applications, and entertainment software such as video games. Several groups provide both free and proprietary C++ compiler software, including the GNU Project, Microsoft, Intel and Embarcadero Technologies. C++ has greatly influenced many other popular programming languages, most notably C# and Java. C++ is also used for hardware design, where the design is initially described in C++, then analyzed, architecturally constrained, and scheduled to create a register-transfer level hardware description language via high-level synthesis. The language began as enhancements to C, first adding classes, then virtual functions, operator overloading, multiple inheritance, templates, and exception handling among other features. After years of development, the C++ programming language standard was ratified in 1998 as ISO/IEC 14882:1998. The standard was amended by the 2003 technical corrigendum, ISO/IEC 14882:2003. The current standard extending C++ with new features was ratified and published by ISO in September 2011 as ISO/IEC 14882:2011 (informally known as C++11). Note: This free app is ad supported and may contain ads in the notification tray and/or home screen. Keywords: polymorphism, oops concept, C++, Cpp, programming, language, pointer, coding, interview, functions,

Is Canada larger than China? Does Brazil or Germany have more internet users? With Rank Master, you can prove your knowledge about the countries of the world by sorting them by various facts. Let Rank Master take you on a world trip and find out if the huge South Africa or maybe the populous United Kingdom have more kilometres of paved roads, learn which country is only 2 square kilometer big and which country has the highest life expectancy – Look forward to some aha moments and challenging questions. Depending on the level you have a certain amount of time to rank four to five countries according to a specific value like area, population or birth rate. The solution shows you whether your estimation was right. You get points for every correct ranking but be careful, if the ranking is completely wrong points will be withdrawn. The data and facts of the countries which Rank Master is based on data loaded directly from the CIA World Factbook. Rank Master is not only a perfect opportunity to make up for missed geography lessons in a playful way but has with its intuitive handling, the big fun factor definitely a high level of addictivity. With millions of possible country combinations, almost no question will be asked twice. FEATURES - Simple, but addictive Gameplay - Intuitive handling - 18 levels - Online high score - Up to date country facts directly from the CIA World Factbook

★★★ #1 Deuces Wild Video Poker app on Android ★★★ Test your skills and play against the house on your favourite Video Poker game - Deuces Wild. Enjoy the thrilling experience of playing the ORIGINAL video poker game on your Android Device. Perfect your game before leaving to Las Vegas! This app would take you there. Make strategy, optimise it, track your stats and improve your winnings before you head to a real casino! Unlike slots machines, video poker allows the player to use skill to beat the house. Play this popular game just like in Las Vegas. The app is FREE for a very limited time. Download now! Enjoy the Casino Experience! ★★Features★★ => Fast and easy game play. => Sound & music just like the real thing. => Multiple Bet options starting from $100 => Real casino shuffling of cards. => Double Up your winnings - Optional. Can be disable from the options menu. => Statistics to track your performance. => Game Center Leader board. => Daily bonus coins. ★★★★★★For the users who are new to Video Poker★★★★★★ Video poker is a casino game based on five-card draw poker. It is played on a computerised console similar in size to a slot machine. After inserting money (or a barcoded paper ticket with credit) into the machine, play begins by placing a bet of one or more credits and pressing the "deal" button. The player is then given cards and has the opportunity to discard one or more of them in exchange for new ones drawn from the same virtual deck. After the draw, the machine pays out if the hand or hands played match one of the winning combinations, which are posted in the pay table. Pay tables allocate the payouts for hands and are based on how rare they are, the game variation, and the decision of the game operator. A typical pay table starts with a minimum hand of a pair of jacks, which pays even money. All the other hand combinations in video poker are the same as in table poker, including such hands as two pair, three of a kind, straight (a sequence of 5 cards of different suits), flush (any 5 cards of the same suit), full house (a pair and a three of a kind), four of a kind (four cards of the same value), straight flush (5 consecutive cards of the same suit) and royal flush (a Ten, a Jack, a Queen, a King and an Ace of the same suit). There are many variations of video poker. They include Deuces Wild, where a two serves as a wild card, pay schedule modification, where four aces with a five or smaller kicker pays an enhanced amount (these games usually have some adjective in the title such as "bonus", "double", or "triple"); and multi-play poker, where the player starts with a base hand, and each additional played hand draws from a different set of cards with the base hand. (Multi-play games are offered in "Triple Play", "Five Play", "Ten Play", "Fifty Play" and "One Hundred Play" versions.) In games which do not have a wild card a player on average will receive the rare four-of-a-kind hand approximately once every 500 hands, while a player may play tens of thousands of hands before an extremely rare royal flush, which usually has the highest payout. For Support or any help/suggestions, contact us at : support@phonato.com

Slidejoy is a rewards app for Android that pays you in real cash or rewards you in gift cards. Earn real cash by having trending news and ads appear on your lockscreen daily. Instantly redeem cash rewards to your PayPal account or receive gift card rewards to your favorite retailers/brands. You can even make a gift and donate the money you make or rewards you earned to charity! Earn extra cash online instantly by downloading our free lockscreen app today! How it Works Every time you check your phone, you will get a card with news or a promotion on your lockscreen. ‐Slide UP to see more news ‐Slide RIGHT to unlock your phone and go to your home screen ‐Slide LEFT to get more information on the content ‐Slide DOWN to access your notifications and app shortcut menu To get paid and earn real money, you DO NOT have to slide left, take a survey, tap for money, download an app, or do anything other than to use your phone as you normally do. You also don't receive more or less for engaging with the ads. Yes, it’s that SIMPLE. Slidejoy is an award‐winning app that has been featured on TV and in major tech and news publications. Our team is always looking for extra ways to keep our users happy, so feel free to send us feedback and make your way to our Facebook Page. https://www.facebook.com/slidejoy Features -Get paid to see news and ads on an intelligent lockscreen -Earn points (Carats) instantly and redeem them for real money or gift cards -Enjoy trending news and timely ads on your lockscreen -News, deals and ads are tailored to your preferences -What you earn is updated daily the next day -Slidejoy provides you with 12 additional redemption options to get paid or receive gift cards -Quick, fast cash payments What Can You Do With Your Daily Rewards? Keep it and cash your Carats out with PayPal or gift cards. or Make a gift and give your rewards to good causes. FAQs ‐How many Carats do I need before I can redeem them? Once you earn 100 Slidejoy Carats, you can cash out or gift the money to charity (after you’ve used Slidejoy for one month). 100 Slidejoy Carats is equal to $1. ‐When do I get paid? You get paid every month and can cash out via PayPal, gift card or donate the money to a charity. About us We make advertising interesting through efficient products, sleek design and superior value for consumers.

Quotes from our users “Absolutely brilliant, made our holiday. Recommendations were worth while. Maps and directions were superb. We'd have been lost without it. Offline mode worked a treat. Thanks very much.” By Bragger93 from United Kingdom on May 14, 2013 “This is the travel app I've been waiting for!! One stop shop.” By Gun-Metal Gray from United States on May 21, 2013 “Leave your Lonely Planet or Frommer’s at home! This is your travel guide now.” By an Android User from Netherlands on Jun 8, 2013 About Triposo Founded by and for travelers, Triposo delivers up-to-date information, detailed maps and intelligent recommendations for more than 40,000 destinations in 200 countries around the world. To make our guides we use the content that is freely available. Open content sites like Wikitravel, Wikipedia, World66 and OpenStreetMap are among the best resources for any traveler. We consider location, time, weather and your personal preferences to deliver custom, real-time recommendations of places to go and things to see. Whether you are a planner or prefer to go with the flow, Triposo helps you discover the unexpected and experience travel in a new way. If you see any problem with the app, please write us an email at feedback@triposo.com so we can figure out what’s wrong and fix it. Thanks!

Explore the city or embark on a campaign of missions for the Las Vegas Mob Boss. Over 130 sq miles of the city of Las Vegas are modeled in incredible detail. This level of detail hasn't been seen in any flight simulator on any platform. The famous Las Vegas strip includes over 50 hotels that are modeled with photo realism. Fly past the Luxor, buzz the New York New York, or attempt a landing on top of the Bellagio. Flight Unlimited also features street traffic, a first for a mobile flight simulator. Cars, trucks, and buses zoom around the city. Can you and your plane share the road? This is without a doubt, the most graphically advanced flight simulator in the app store. Weeks after flying you'll notice meticulous graphical details for the first time. Tires smoke as the plane hits the ground, aircraft metal deforms in a crash, the Bellagio fountains spring to life, sun glare blinds your view, and more. The Flight Unlimited team is dedicated to providing game updates. Features: - Console quality graphics - Optimized graphics depending on the device being used. Some of the best visuals in the app store. - Over 130 sq miles of satellite imaged terrain - Grand Theft Auto style Missions - Volumetric clouds and enhanced lighting effects - 8 aircraft including the Cessna 172, Challenger Learjet, Douglas DC-3, Robin DR400, Grumman Goose Amphibious Aircraft, Pitts Special, A10 Tank Killer, P40 Mustang, and the FA/18 (IAP) - Full flap, gear, brake, and rudder controls - Cockpit camera, Chase camera, Tower camera, and a full customizable camera - Street traffic (cars and buses) - Advanced particle effects (tire smoke, engine fires, water splash) - Destructive aircraft bodies. Wings rip off, engines separate, the aircraft metal bends and deforms. *Note - If the game crashes its a memory issue, please restart your device and try again, it will work.

GOT PROBLEMS? CALL OR EMAIL US SO WE CAN GET ENOUGH INFORMATION TO FIX THE PROBLEM! X-Plane is the most flexible and realistic flight simulator on the market for desktop and mobile devices. Using blade element theory for the most powerful and accurate flight model available for personal computers, and earning FAA certification for logging of flight time for pilots, X-Plane is the Gold Standard for accurate flight simulation, offering realism that is unmatched by any other simulator. This version includes: - 6 scenery regions included (15 more available for purchase) - 10 different aircraft of varying types (43 more available for purchase) - Fly Dawn, Day, Dusk, Night - Fly in VFR/IFR conditions from clear skies to overcast. - You control the weather! - Simulated system failures! - Bird Strikes! - Multiplayer over WiFi! - Installs right to your SD card (Froyo/2.2 support required)

PROFIT Calculate the profit for your Bitcoin, Litecoin, Namecoin and a lot of other altcoins. See below for the supported coins. ALARMS (After a donation) Set alarms and get notifications for your total profit and/or crypto currency rate/value/profit. These alarms can also be selected in Tasker via: state -> plugin. HOW IT WORKS Fill in how many BTC, LTC, NMC, etc. you have and the price you've paid for it. The app calculates your profit using the API of some exchanges (see below for the full list). The fee is considered in this calculation. The prices shown are the prices for which you can sell your coins. It is also possible to show your profit in bitcoins, to do so you need to fill in the price of one bitcoin at the moment you bought your alternate coin (the third input field). To make the app easier to use, the values you enter are stored. You can also view the history of your last 100 profits. To keep out the average user that borrows your phone from viewing your profit, you can now set a password as a simple protection. Adds can be removed with a donation via in-app purchase or crypto currency. The supported currencies for buy/rate/value and profit are: - USD - EUR (from Btc-e, Bitstamp or MtGox) - BTC - AUD - CAD - EUR (from regular exchange) - GBP - RUB The supported exchanges are: - ANX (anxbtc.com) - Btc-e (btc-e.com) - Bter (bter.com) - Coinbase (coinbase.com) - Crypto-Trade (crypto-trade.com) - Cryptsy (cryptsy.com) - Poloniex (poloniex.com) - Kraken (kraken.com) - Vircurex (vircurex.com) Below is an incomplete list, a full list can be found at http://www.liuto-apps.com/app_page/bitcoin.html#supported - Better Launcher is a new home screen replacement app for Android 4.1+ . It's based from the Launcher app from Android 4.4 (code name KitKat), you can find the base version as "Google Now Launcher" in the play store, it supports all the functions of the home app in Android 4.4: • Performance and stabilities optimizations from Android 4.4 • Dynamic home screen management (home screens are added/removed as they are needed) • Homescreen interface enhancements from Android 4.4 Better Launcher added many enhancements, here are some highlights: Main features: • Ok, Google - Use Google Search's hotword right from the home screen, just say "Ok, Google" to start. (This feature uses the Google search app, make sure the hotword detection is supported on your device in Google search) • Scrollable dock with up to 9 icons per page and up to 5 pages • Enhanced performance and stabilities over the default launcher • Tons of fun animations, effects and other eye candy • Homescreen gestures (pinch, swipe up/down, double tap) • Theme engine compatible with many Launcher themes, including GO Launcher, Adw Launcher, Nova Launcher, Apex Launcher, Holo Launcher etc • Change folder preview, icon size, animation speed, and many other things that you won't be able to change with the default launcher • Unread Counts • Backup/restore settings and data • Optimized for both phones and tablets • Lots of other customization options! Why use Better Launcher over the other launchers? • It's has many bug fixes and performance/stabilities updates from Android 4.4 • It's lean and small in size • Allow widgets in the dock • It has better theme support, it loads most of the launcher themes on the play store with no problems • It supports all of the Next Live Wallpapers Important Notes: • This app is currently in Beta, everything is free to use, no restrictions. • Make sure you check updates frequently, many bugs will be fixed as they are discovered. Many missing features that other launchers have will be added in the near future Permissions: • Better Launcher only use those permissions that it needs in order to work correctly. It does not and will never abuse these permissions. • Access Widget Data: Needed to display widgets • Internet/Network State/Wifi State: Anonymous error/usage reporting, update checks • Directly call phone numbers: Only used if you place a direct-dial shortcut on the homescreen. • Change Wallpaper/Vibrate/Status Bar: Standard Launcher functions • USB (SD) Storage: Backup/restore
release_text: - Fixed crash on older devices - Say "Ok, Google" to start voice search on the home screen - Setting (Homescreen) to turn off the screen fade effect during screen transition

Make Words is one of the best brain teasing addictive word games in the market. The goal of the game is to make as many words as you can from given 7 letters . You have 3 minutes to finish your task. Make Words Main features. * More than 15000 different letter combinations * Hint option * Complete description for each word * Automatic Save/Continue * Global Scoring system * Nice graphics Make Words will provide you many and many hours of entertainment. When you guess a word, you get some points and additional time.You will get extra points if you guess all the words! You can compete with dozens of other Make Words fans by Global Scoring System. It can be a fantastic challenge for you. There is a Hint option to help you to guess the hidden words. It will open a single random letter from each hidden word. The hint will become active as soon as you guess 50% of the hidden words. If you have guessed some words and can't guess anything else, you can press the "Give Up" button and the board with hidden words will be opened.If some word is unfamiliar to you, you can tap the word to see its definition. This game will be helpful for people who want to improve their English. If you like word games you will definitely love Make Words. Make Words uses dictionary which contain nouns, verbs, plurals and also some rare words. But anyway you can look up the definition of every word you want. If you are looking for a good word game, Make Words is the one you need! Hope you will enjoy playing this game!!!
release_text: 1.3 * "Hint" feature added. As soon as you have guessed 50% of all possible words, the Hint feature will become available. By using Hint you will open a single random letter from each word. * "Save / Continue" feature added. Now the game's state will be automatically saved when you leave the game. * Better letter combinations. The letter combinations have been completely re-factored.

Ears are as important as eyes and nose, so those who like to be a doctor have a chance to experience the amazing kid’s fun game for free. ***PRIVACY POLICY*** Being a developer we truly understand that privacy plays an important role. You can read our privacy policy here: https://www.tenlogix.com/PrivacyPolicy.php ***LIKE US ON FACEBOOK*** To share your experiences and stay updated with what TenLogix Games is working on. Play and enjoy doctor games and get yourself educated with Throat doctor, Nail Doctor, Nose Doctor, My Little Dentist and other fun & fashion games like pan cake maker, cupcake maker, Eye makeup salon and Face makeover. https://www.facebook.com/tenlogix ================================================================ ***MESSAGE*** Your suggestions & Feedback are valuable to help us keep working on new concepts. ***DISCLAIMER*** This app is ad supported and may contain ads.

CollegeSeeker offers a convenient way to search for your ideal colleges. Features: * Search for colleges by state, major, college type, college enrollment, and/or location * Save colleges for future reference * Find colleges where your SAT or ACT scores fall roughly in the middle 50% of the student body * Search feature to quickly find a specific college * Sort colleges by graduation rate, SAT scores, total cost, average net cost, student-faculty ratio, and more * Detailed information for each college, including the acceptance rate, graduation rates, total cost, average net cost, student-faculty ratio, and percentage of students receiving grants from the college. Note: This app currently searches only for four-year colleges. However, support for two-year colleges may be added in a future release.
release_text: - CollegeSeeker now supports searching for colleges by a specific major.

description: You will be presented with 5 random Dinosaurs out of 113! Select the best choice at the bottom of the screen for each of the 4 categories: Genus, Meaning, Suborder and Size. There are also skull and skeleton bonus questions. The timer reflects your score, so speed counts!
This application contains Beautiful rangoli collections.

Play a fierce warrior of the land of the Rising Sun in this exhilarating runner and test your reflexes in multiples jump race. The Speed Ninja is an amusing game for the whole family! Only recommended for... everyone! CARACTERISTICS - 100 levels - 300 stars to collect - Best Scores - Touch the screen to jump or crouch HOW TO PLAY? While an army is approaching, a young ninja is leaping from roof to roof. His objective? Let the gongs resound and alert the multiples districts of his village before the enemy attacks. Your goal is thus to get to those gongs which are at the end of each level. You’ll have to jump from platform to platform without falling but also to evade the different obstacles that you’ll meet and kill your enemies with your shurikens. Your dexterity will quickly be challenged by this game and its always evolving difficulty. Each new level will be harder than the last one: its length will be greater, its obstacles will become more and more numerous and its pitfall larger and darker. PLAYTOUCH is happy to show you its brand new game: The Speed Ninja. The Speed Ninja is an amusing game for the whole family! Only recommended for... everyone!
release_text: Music and sound ambience added to the game Performance and compatibility improvements New User interface New localizations Bugs fixed

description: The clasic SPACE SHOOTER experience! You are humanity's last chance for survival and you will have to eliminate the entire alien threat! Don't worry, you have a large arsenal of weapons and ships to help you. Things will not be easy and you may find yourself in serious situations! Gain XP, upgrade your gear and keep going until your mission is accomplished! EQUIPMENT - 4+ ship types - 10+ weapon types THREAT - swarms of alien star ships - ground turrets - danger all around - insanely challenging boss fights GAME - incredible HD graphics - the classical addictive arcade shooter Give us your feedback and help us improve the game at gamesbytimmy@gmail.com . We will bring you more levels, more weapons and even more threats to tackle! If your phone does not have the LED events indicator - this program will help. LED from the camera of your phone will alert you of incoming calls, missed calls, received SMS. You can also set up notifications via vibration. Notifications stop as soon as the screen is unlocked. You can configure the silent time, during which the program will not bother you. Ads free. Only necessary android permission. Flash Allerts. LED indicator. Call SMS notifications.

Permainan ini mengharuskan anda menjawab beberapa pertanyaan dengan 4 pilihan jawaban. Selain itu, anda juga diberikan 3 bantuan yaitu, bertanya pada penonton, bertanya pada teman, dan hilangkan 2 jawaban yang salah. Permainan ini tidak membutuhkan koneksi internet, kapan pun dimana pun anda bisa memainkan permainan ini. Koneksi internet hanya dibutuhkan pada saat tersedia update pertanyaan, maka dengan otomatis pertanyaan-pertanyaan yang ada akan diupdate. Tunggu apa lagi buktikan bahwa anda cukup pintar untuk mencapai 1 Milyar! This game requires you to answer a few questions with four possible answers. In addition, you are also given three relief that is, asked the audience, asking friends, and eliminate two wrong answers. This game does not require internet connection, anytime, anywhere you can play this game. Internet connection is only required at the time provided an update query, then automatically there are questions that will be updated. Wait no longer prove that you are smart enough to reach 1 billion!

*** NOTE: if you have a Samsung Galaxy S5 or newer Samsung Note, you no longer have a hardware menu button. Please LONG TAP on the recently used apps icon next to the home button to access the app menu *** The easiest way to keep score at a cricket match with the most detail captured. Determines and displays detailed stats of cricket matches as automatically as possible, with minimal data entry. If you are not an official scorer for a team, you may enjoy keeping score as you watch limited overs, Twenty20, IPL, or a Test match live or on television, perhaps while watching your child play. Many users of this app manage to umpire and keep score at the same time. * Just touch where the ball reached, then pick how many runs were scored * Produces wagon wheels for each batsman and an e-mailable scorecard (including a wagon wheel page per batsman) for publishing to a web site or transfer to a computer * Press Menu button for scorecard and then More ... for other features such as saving/loading a game * Long tap batsman, bowler and 'This Over' areas of Runs tab for less commonly used actions such as retired hurt or declare innings Enjoy this free app, like I have enjoyed so many of the other free Android apps! - Tim. "Give and it will be given to you." *************************** Please e-mail me feedback (address below in Developer Info section) since I can't reply to comments left with ratings or contact you regarding bug fixes/change requests. See WEB PAGE (also below in Developer Info section) for app TIPS and limitations. IMPORTANT: Don't use this Android app as your only record of scoring for a match, no liability accepted for incorrect data or data loss. If you would like some more advanced scoring features then please check out the paid version of this app: "Cricket Scorer+ for Android". Cricket Scorer+ for Android is Cricket Scorer for Android PLUS new features/changes, many requested by users.
release_text: Resolved problem loading saved matches on some Android 4.4 (KitKat) and 5.0 (Lollipop) devices.

Dr. Trivia is the incredible game of questions and answers, now in English, Spanish and Catalan! Including questions with images! Test your knowledge, challenge your friends and pass exams of Dr. Trivia! Will you be able to answer more than 1000 questions from Dr. Trivia? Do you consider yourself an expert in geography? Do you know the flags of the world? You know everything there is to know about movies? Are you a science expert? Do you know more history that Marty McFly? Now you can prove it! Dr. Trivia is a game of questions and answers with 6 exciting categories: Geography, Movies and Television, History, Art, Science and Kids. You can combine the categories as you wish! Choose one, two, three ... or all of them! And this is just the beginning. The game will be expanded with the questions you suggest to us! To win, you must answer the questions and get maximum points in any of the 5 game modes: * Time Trial: Answer as many questions as you can in a limited time ... Dr. Trivia will reward with extra time for every right answer! * No Time: Simply answer as many questions as you want. Take it easy, you have all the time in the world! * 10 Questions: Answer 10 questions. Do you dare? * 20 Questions: Answer 20 questions. Show what you know! * No error: Answer as many questions as you can... but no errors are allowed! The ultimate challenge! If you repeatedly win, Dr. Trivia will reward you with a Bonus Star and ... you can use the stars to answer questions you do not know! Do you think the game is too easy? Or do you still need some practice? No problem! Dr. Trivia features 100 difficulty levels. Move the bar and tune the difficulty! Can you master level 100? The game comes in two versions: * Dr. Trivia? Free: All features and 500 questions that will test your skills. You can receive up to three stars. * Dr. Trivia?: All features and 1000 questions to test your knowledge. You can receive up to 6 stars, and includes the category "Kids", specially designed for children to play!. If you do not like ads, this version has no ads. Visit us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/corbomiteapps See our Apps: http://play.google.com/store/search?q=Corbomite+Productions Send us an email or suggest questions: corbomiteproductions@gmail.com If you spot an error, do not hesitate and send us an email. And if you like Dr. Trivia, rate it on Google Play!

Современная прикладная программа для эффективного и успешного общения на французском языке. Преднозначается как начинающим, так и тем, кто желает пополнить свой запас слов. Особенное внимание обращается на самое важное языковое умение - способность свободного общения на французском языке. Инновационный метод коммуникации, применённый в программе, позволяет быстро избавиться от барьера при говорении и исправно выражаться в ежедневных ситуациях. Прикладная программа предназначается прежде всего заинтересованным в активном овладении французским языком. Все слова, фразы и диалоги записаны профессиональными французскими дикторами. Логический раздел на 127 тем и категорий вместе с быстрой системой поиска позволяет сразу найти каждое нужное слово или фразу. Прикладная программа замечательно выполняет роль электронического, говорящего переводчика во время поездок за границу. Благодаря ней с лёгкостью сможешь общаться во всех типичных ситуациях - в магазине, в банке, в гостинице, в аэропорту... Без проблем купишь билет в кассе, сделаешь заказ в ресторане, спросишь о дорогу или договаришься о встрече. Прикладная программа является замечательной помощью для готовящихся к устным экзаменам по французскому языку, а также выезжающих за границу в туристических целях, работать или учиться. Главные черты: - записи с участием настоящих французов - 127 тематических груп и категории - практический разговорник, речевая практика и диалоги - французско-русский, русско-французский словарь - наука правильного произношения - создание собственных диалогов и ситуативных сценок - инновационная система запоминания фраз - быстрый поиск слов и выражений - простая запись произношения - примеры употребления слов в предложениях - конверсативный курс французского языка - интегрированный плеер слов и выражений Прикладная программа, благодаря которой быстро и без усилия начнёшь разговаривать на французском языке. Даже если раньше ты не знал ни одного слова на этом языке. Здесь нет никаких упражнений или скучной грамматики. Применён инновационный метод "Easy Talk" так лёгкий и быстрый, что уже после нескольких минут будешь говорить по-французски. ГАРАНТИРУЕМ. Бесплатная версия программы содержит 800 слов и выражений, зато в полной версии доступны больше 4000 слов, выражений и предложений. Modern application for an efficient and effective communication in French. Prednoznachaetsya both beginners and those who wish to add to your vocabulary. Particular attention is drawn to the most important language skill - the ability to freely communicate in French. An innovative method of communication employed in the program, you can quickly get rid of the barrier when speaking and properly expressed in everyday situations. The application program is intended primarily interested in the active mastery of the French language. All words, phrases and dialogues are written by professional French speakers. Logical partition on 127 topics and categories, together with a quick search system allows you to immediately find each desired word or phrase. The application program performs a great role by electronic talking translator during trips abroad. Thanks to it you can easily communicate in all typical situations - in a store, a bank, a hotel, at the airport ... No problem, buy a ticket at the box office, to order in a restaurant, ask for directions or contracting for a meeting. The application program is a great help for those preparing for the oral examination of the French language, as well as traveling abroad in order to travel, work or study. The main features: - Records with the participation of these French - 127 thematic groups and categories - A practical phrasebook, speech practice and dialogues - French-Russian, Russian-French dictionary - The science of correct pronunciation - Create their own dialogues and situational scenes - An innovative memory system phrases - Quick search words and phrases - A simple record of pronunciation - Examples of the use of words in sentences - Konversativny French course - Integrated player words and expressions An application by which to quickly and easily begin to speak in French. Even if you previously did not know a single word in that language. There are no exercises or boring grammar. Used an innovative method of "Easy Talk" so easy and fast that after a few minutes you will speak French. GUARANTEE. Free version of the program contains 800 words and expressions, but the full version is available in excess of 4000 words, phrases and sentences.

This Geometry app is built for elementary kids ages 5 - 10. App teaches a plethora of geometrical concepts listed below. The App contains Learning modules that explain each concept clearly, with illustrations (including real life examples) and narration that can be followed with ease. Practice modules are also included. Practice modules lets kids practice at their own pace. We have also included a unique geometry riddles section in which clues are presented, and kids are supposed to figure out the geometrical shape based on the clues provided (a great way to indulge kids & reinforce concepts in a class room setting). A Critical Thinking section is also provided that provides challenging questions to spark up young minds. App is very ideally suited as a study aid in classrooms, homeschooling and a wonderful refresher at home. It comprehends curriculum based geometry concepts taught in Kindergarten to 5th grade. This wonderful app contains Learn & Practice sections on the below topic. * 2D shapes - Ages (3-6) * 3D Shapes - Ages (5-8) * Faces and Sides - Ages (6-9) * Corners and Square Corners - Ages (6-9) * Symmetry - Ages (3-8) * Line Segments, Rays, & Angles - Ages (7-10) * Polygons & Triangles - Ages (7-10) * Congruence, & Transformations - Ages (8-10) * Who Am I - Riddles. - Ages (5-10) * Critical Thinking - Ages (5-10) This elegant app is easy to use, intuitive and most importantly, provides great educational content with beautiful illustrations and narrations for students, schools and parents. More deep down subtopics and challenging questions related to geometry are coming in later updates. Parents - Understanding geometrical concepts are integral part of every school curriculum. Please carve out a few minutes from your busy schedule and sit with your kid, and explore this geometry app. You will be pleasantly surprised how many things you have forgotten about, that you once knew. This app is created by a team of high school students, educators, and parents in Texas.
release_text: Thank you for your wonderful support as always. This latest update (Version 3.0), fixes app crashes on certain devices, and supports newer tablets,and phones. Please continue to provide us with your constructive feedback. If you have any issues, please contact us directly at http://apps.nthfusion.com Nth Fusion team

description: ★★★ Google Play selects Accupedo pedometer as 2014 Best 30 Apps at Google Play Store in Japan and Korea. [Dec. 2014] "Accupedo Pedometer Widget made good walking buddies in our last tests." [Washington Post, 10/1/12] "Among cellphone apps the Accupedo pedometer widget for Android phones had the top spot." [LA Times, 12/28/11] Accupedo is an accurate pedometer app that monitors your daily walking on the home screen. With easy to read charts and history logs, monitor your steps, calories burned, distance, and time. As your best walking buddy, Accupedo will motivate you to walk more! Set up your daily goal and step towards a healthier you with Accupedo pedometer. ++++ ATTENTION ++++ Test with a free Accupedo to see if your phone works well with Accupedo-Pro before purchasing it. Some phones do not support the G-sensor in SLEEP (STANDBY, when screen is OFF) mode by those phone manufacturers. This is not a defect of this app. An intelligent 3D motion recognition algorithm is embedded to track only walking patterns by filtering and ejecting out non walking activities. Accupedo counts your steps regardless of where you put your phone like your pocket, waist belt, or bag. Be healthy by setting up your daily goal and accurately monitoring your steps with Accupedo. ++++ Features ++++ ● The intelligent algorithm starts tracking after 10 consecutive steps, then stops and restarts automatically as you walk. ● Customizable widget display modes: steps, distance, minutes, calories, and Lap. ● Daily log history: step counts, distance, calories, and walking time. ● Charts: Daily, weekly, monthly, and yearly step counts. ● Power usage mode options for efficient power saving. ● Customized personal settings: sensitivity, metric/english, step distance, body weight, daily goal, etc. ● Concise widget display on Home screen: 2x1, 3x1, and 4x1 ● Edit daily step counts. ● Lap: “odometer” function for short walk. ● Resume/Pause/Reset. ● Database backup: SD-Card and Google Drive. ● Widget skin colors: black, blue, green, orange, pink, transparent. ● Share daily log on the Facebook. ● Email a daily log file. ● Language option: default and English ++++ Installation ++++ ● WATCH YOUTUBE FOR INSTALLATION VIDEO (Type in Accupedo) for more information. - For Android OS 4.0 or higher 1. After downloading, click App icon. You will see Widgets tab on the top. 2. Choose Widget, and search for Accupedo. - For Android OS 2.2 or 2.3 1. After downloading, press and hold your finger on the empty space of the Home screen. (If your Home screen is full of Apps, remove at least two adjacent App because Accupedo needs two App space to install it.) “Add to Home screen” menu will appear with options listing. 2. Select Widgets from the menu, and then select the widget named “Accupedo”. ++++ Notes ++++ ● It performs best when the phone is on your waist belt. ● Step count may not be accurate if you put your phone in loose fit pants due to the random movement your phone makes in the pocket. ● The sensitivity of a phone can be different from others. So, choose a sensitivity level that works best for your phone. ● Help and FAQ are built in the App.

The ClicSysCounter/Maximo Mobile Demo Tool is a fully functional mobile inventory client with bar-code scanning for use with IBM Maximo 7.5. This app was produced and published to assist Maximo users in their understanding of how putting live Maximo capabilities in the hands of their mobilized workforce will benefit their organization. If you would like to answer questions concerning acceptability and performance of small devices in your environment or need to do a hands-on investigation into potential benefits and limitations of Android device use with Maximo, this is for you. While not intended to be anything more than a demo app, it does provide fully functional capabilities that allow checking inventory counts and adjusting them in real-time, as would be done, for example, when performing physical or cycle counts. Disclaimer: This app provides only Application Server security and passes unencrypted data to Maximo. There is no remote device management capability included. This should not be used for general distribution and use in your workforce. It is recommended that this be used by IT & Business-process decision makers (or their trusted designees) in order to help justify a mobility project.

description: This tower defense game will present you the truly stunning European battlefield during World War II. Features: - Real weapons in World War II (Bazooka / 155mm Cannon / B-29 Bomber / kettenkrad / Volkswagen Kubelwagen / PzKpfw Panzer VI Ausf. E Tiger / Zeppelin Airship). - Reappear the Great Historical Battles in Europe during WW II. - Realistic visual effect, ultra-HD (UHD**) pictures and stunning sound effect. - RPG-like upgrading system. - 27 medals for you to achieve. - 6 different types of defending positions and air support. - Restore the European battlefields in World War II realistically. - The campaign and customized battles contain 24 challenging maps with 3 difficulty levels; 3 modes are available (3 campaign and 1 customized battles with all modes are available in the free version). **Note: for old phones, please set the graphics settings to low in order to enjoy smooth pictures. Please also note that the UHD effect of this game may not fit small-screen devices such as 240*320 phones. Please don't rate us low due to this issue. Introduction: The background of this game starts from Normandy landing in 1944 to the ultimate victory of the entire European battlefield. As an Allied commander, you will need to command your troops to fight against Nazi German's attack and obtain the victory of World War II eventually! ------------------------------ Cat Studio - We do TD right! Check out these exciting TD games by Cat Studio! ------------------------------ 【Little Commander - World War II TD】 - A TD game with very cute visual style. 【Soldiers of Glory : Modern War】 - A TD game that enemies could attack you back! 【Global Defense: Zombie War】 - Do you like killing zombies? Then you will like this defense game! 【Little Commander 2】 - the sequel of "Little Commander – World War II TD", more towers, more fun! And many more! Visit our games on http://cat-studio.net/ ------------------------------ Cat Studio's Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/CatStudioGames Cat Studio's Tiwtter: https://twitter.com/CatStudio_Games Cat Studio's Youtube Channel: https://youtube.com/CatStudioGames ------------------------------ Facebook Page of Soldiers of Glory - WW II: https://www.facebook.com/SoldiersofGloryWW2 Facebook Page of Soldiers of Glory - Modern War: https://www.facebook.com/SoldiersofGloryMW

description: Developed by Mynet , Turkey's most fun 101 Okey game is now available on iPhone and iPad's. You can play 101 Okey anywhere you want. Chat with your friends , break the pot plus earn Mynet Liras. ************  You can play Mynet Çanak 101 Okey either as a guest or with your Facebook account. Play with your Facebook friends or meet new friends and socialize. To make your Çanak Okey experience more fun , you are daily awarded with free Mynet Lira. Don't forget to come back every day and earn more! Çanak 101 Okey is a four-player Turkish game played with rummy tiles. The main difference with Okey is that players begin with hands of 21 tiles instead of 15. A player's first meld must have a value of at least 101. With Çanak 101 Okey try to break the pot by melding your joker as last tile. Game Features: - Çanak 101 Okey is played online with real opponents. - Multiplatform support. (You can play with the same account on your iDevices and PC.) - All in game graphics are Retina Display. - Play online using 3G , Edge or Wireless internet. - You can play Çanak 101 Okey by teaming up with a friend. - Play instantly by using 'Hemen Oyna' feature.. - You can invite your friends in your room or go to their rooms. - You can obtain Mynet Lira in game and continue to play. --- You can follow latest news and updates about this game at: http://www.facebook.com/canak101okey For More Games: http://mobil.mynet.com
release_text: Turkey's most fun 101 Okey game is now better and improved than ever! + Performance improvements + Minor bug fixes

WEAKENDアプリのもう一つの魅力、友達の対戦だってもちろん対応しています。 育てたキャラクタ３人を選び、友達と対戦。どのキャラクタにどの技をセットするか、組み合わせは無限大! サイトでは月に1回程度、大会を開いていますので是非ご参加ください。 ▼注意 動作確認ができてる機種が大変少ないです。 完全版をご購入の前にFREE版で動作に問題がないかをご確認の上、ご購入ください。 ------ 対応OS：Android OS 2.1以上 対応言語：日本語 ※不具合に関して サイトにサポート掲示板やサポート用のメールアドレスを準備しております。 レビュー等へ不具合の報告をされると個別の対応ができませんのでサポート掲示板やサポートアドレスをご利用ください。 ------ 更新履歴 2012/4/26 Android版初公開

Usage Timelines is a CPU and process monitor with a graphical cpu load history in the notification bar and a list of running apps. A trial version is available at http://www.refined-apps.com/trials/UsageTimelinesPro-release.apk For questions, remarks, suggestions or feedback mail us at support@refined-apps.com For an add-free version see "Usage Timelines Pro" (https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.als.usagetimelines.pro) ---- Features ------------ ✓ Extended cpu load history as notification in the notification bar (like xload/windows task manager) ✓ Process listing ✓ Cpu and memory usage of processes (similar to "top" or windows task manager) ✓ Processes can be terminated and uninstalled ✓ Works without rooting ✓ Very low power usage ✓ Supports English and German ---- Free vs. Pro Version ------------ The pro version supports all features of the free version plus ✓ a widget to quickly start/stop the cpu load history notification ✓ settings to change the notification colors ✓ no ads and thus smaller resource consumption ---- Power Consumption ------------ Some remarks about power consumption and performance ✓ tl;dr Set your update intervals as high as acceptable for you. Power consumption should be fine then. Shorter update intervals lead to higher power consumption since the values are updated more often. You may also use it just when you experience problems and turn off the notification otherwise. ✓ Usage Timelines has been highly optimized ✓ If everything is fine, Usage Timelines should be the app in the app list that uses most cpu since all other apps should be paused by android. That's normal and expected behavior. ✓ Displaying the process list needs some additional power, especially if you are working with the app (e.g. scrolling). If the process list is not shown (e.g. while you are using another app), the process list does not use any cpu power. ✓ If the screen is off, only the values for the notification history are acquired to be able to properly update the usage history as soon as the screen is switched on again. Neither the notification history nor the process list are updated if the screen is off since you could not see the update anyway, saving cpu power and lowering power consumption. ✓ The ad library uses some cpu power. You can get rid of this by using the pro version.

( Below is for "Twicca supporters" only ) Twicca supports multi-acount, but not supports retweet from other acount. You can do that by using this plugin. Tap the desired tweet -> View this tweet -> Twicca . Now, you can change your account to retweet. (Simply change acount with right-up button.) *Check "Always" to always open a tweet with the app. To cancel it, Do "Clear Data" in application information. .

This is an English nine-letter grid word game that challenges you to discover all possible words within it. Discovered words in this game must have a minimum of 4 letters and contain the marked letter. Game start off time is 90 seconds, but you get additional 10 seconds for every new word discovered. Hit the shuffle button to rearrange letters or drag letters individually. Review word definitions online. Replay a challenge as many times as you want, while familiarize yourself with discovered words. View game dictionary to study, add or remove words. And also view your list of missed and played words. This word game uses the Enable ( Enhanced North American Benchmark Lexicon) word list. Have fun while learning!

description: You can now make small purchases with your smartphone! It’s simple, fast and secure. Leave your wallet, credit cards and pocket change at home. Sign up for mobile payments at no cost and make credit card purchases of $100 or less with your smartphone. WHO CAN USE IT To use the service, you must: • have an eligible Visa Desjardins card • be a Bell Mobility, Rogers™ Communications, Virgin Mobile Canada or TELUS Communications client and have a data plan • have an eligible smartphone, purchased from your mobility provider • have or get an activated NFC (contactless) SIM card WHERE TO USE IT Make mobile payments in any establishment with a terminal displaying the contactless symbol. HOW TO USE IT Hold your smartphone near a store’s merchant terminal and keep it still for a few seconds to make a payment. AS SAFE AS A CREDIT CARD: • You keep your phone in hand during the entire transaction. • You benefit from Zero Liability in the event of fraud. • You may cancel the service if your phone is lost or stolen. • You can’t be charged twice for the same transaction. • Your identity is protected. No personal information can be obtained from the app. ALL ON YOUR MOBILE DEVICE Thanks to Desjardins, you can stay in control of your finances no matter where you are: • Make purchase with the Mobile Payment app. • Monitor your transactions on AccèsD or AccèsD Affaires mobile. To learn more, go to www.desjardins.com/mobilepayment ************************************** We thank you for your comments. You can rest assured that we read all of them attentively. Unfortunately, we cannot follow up with you through the Google Play. If you want to get a reply from us, please write to us at info@desjardins.com . Your satisfaction is very important to us and it is an integral part of the development of our mobile services. **************************************

description: ✓ army survival manual ✓ army survival kit ✓ army survival knife ✓ army survival ✓ army survival guide ✓ army survival gear ✓ army survival school ✓ army survival bracelet ✓ army survival training The Army has several basic survival kits, primarily for issue to aviators. There are kits for cold climates, hot climates, and overwater. There is also an individual survival kit with a general packet and medical packet. The cold, hot, and overwater kits are in canvas carrying bags. These kits are normally stowed in the helicopter's cargo and passenger area. An aviator's survival vest (SRU-21P), worn by helicopter crews, also contains survival items. U.S. Army aviators flying fixed-wing aircraft equipped with ejection seats use the SRFU-31/P survival vest. The individual survival kits are stowed in the seat pan. Like all other kits, the rigid seat survival kit (RSSK) you use depends on the environment. Items contained in the kits may be ordered separately through supply channels. All survival kits and vests are Common Table of Allowances 50-900 items and can be ordered by authorized units. Figures A-1 through A-6 describe the various survival kits and their contents. Food packets. Snare wire. Smoke, illumination signals. Waterproof matchbox. Saw/knife blade. Wood matches. First aid kit. MC-1 magnetic compass. Pocket knife. Saw/knife/shovel handle. Frying pan. Illuminating candles. Compressed trioxane fuel. Signaling mirror. Survival fishing kit. Plastic spoon. Survival manual (AFM 64-5). Poncho. Insect headnet. Ejector snap. Attaching strap. Kit, outer case. Kit, inner case. Shovel. Water bag. Kit, packing list. Sleeping bag. Figure A-1. Cold Climate Kit Canned drinking water. Waterproof matchbox. Plastic whistle. Smoke, illumination signals. Pocket knife. Signaling mirror. Plastic water bag. First aid kit. Sunburn-prevention cream. Plastic spoon. Food packets. Compression trioxane fuel. Fishing tackle kit. MC-1 magnetic compass. Snare wire. Frying pan. Wood matches. Insect headnet. Reversible sun hat. Tool kit. Kit, packing list. Tarpaulin. Survival manual (AFM 64-5). Kit, inner case. Kit, outer case. Attaching strap. Ejector snap. Figure A-2. Hot Climate Kit Kit, packing list. Raft boat paddle. Survival manual (AFM 64-5). Insect headnet. Reversible sun hat. Water storage bag. MC-1 magnetic compass. Boat bailer. Sponge. Sunburn-prevention cream. Wood matches. First aid kit. Plastic spoon. Pocket knife. Food packets. Fluorescent sea marker. Frying pan. Seawater desalter kit. Compressed trioxane fuel. Smoke, illumination signals. Signaling mirror. Fishing tackle kit. Waterproof matchbox. Raft repair kit.

description: The Synthesis Personality and Emotional Intelligence Test assesses your General Personality Factor (GPF) and Emotional Quotient (EQ). The test measures five dimensions of personality covering the Big Five factors, and six areas of emotional intelligence covering the Mayer-Salovey-Caruso ability model of emotional intelligence. The app test requires you to indicate how far you agree with 48 statements about your behaviour and emotions. At the end of the test, you can choose whether to download and view your results or have them emailed to you. You need a network connection and a document reader to get your feedback report which comes in PDF format. The app stores your test responses and you do not need to do the test in one go. Your results from the assessment are returned as sten scores, sten being an abbreviation for 'Standard Ten'. Your sten scores indicate your approximate position to other people in the Synthesis international comparison group-a group of 26,000 respondents between the ages of 16 and 65 from the USA, Canada, UK, Australia, New Zealand, Singapore and South Africa. Personality and emotional intelligence assessments provide an insight into people's work styles and behaviour. They are used as part of recruitment and development processes to help employers select and develop staff. Doing this test will help you prepare for graduate recruitment and other selection programs that involve taking personality assessment tests.

Rex is a mighty and fearsome tyrannosaurus… well, one day he will be. Right now, all he’s got is one tiny tooth, so even his plant-eating dino friends aren’t afraid of him. One day, Rex’s pals, Ptera, Dino, and Bronto discover a new volcano has erupted in the center of Palm Valley. And with it, beautiful sparkling gems have sprung up, scattered all across the land. Help Rex and friends collect these precious gems while avoiding deep crevices and volcanic spikes and enjoy all thehijinks on the way! Just in time for Christmas! Santa Dash is the latest free app from Smarter Apps. Looks like Santa has been enjoying the holiday eggnog and lost track of time! It's Christmas Eve and Santa has found himself running out of time to deliver all his gifts before the sun rises. There's no time to dive down the chimney and get work done the traditional way, so Santa must race across the rooftop at perilous speeds to finish the last of his holiday deliveries. Help guide Santa and his reindeer across the rooftops while avoiding chimneys or crashing into the buildings or the ground below, all while managing Santa's speed. With the sugar-rush of candy canes and milk and cookies, Santa and his reindeer can reach break-neck speeds, or you can use snow piles and Christmas trees to slow down the sleigh's acceleration. Too fast or too slow can end in a holiday mishap, so you'll need to be careful! Features: - Santa Dash is a "Run-As-Far-As-You-Can" game. - Share your score via Facebook® or Twitter®! We hope that you enjoy playing this free version of Santa Dash and we invite you to contact us if you have suggestions or feedback for us. If you enjoy Santa Dash, please write a positive review telling us what it is you like about your experience. Merry Christmas and Happy Holidays!

Explore local space with this handy 3D app! The Near Star Map is an easy-to-use 3D visualization tool for nearby stars within 50 light-years of Earth's solar system. With Writing Challenge you will enjoy a game with creative prompts to spark your inspiration and master free writing. Forget about the fear to blank page. Your writing won't stop. HOW DOES IT WORK? It's easy. You just have to press "start" and the app gives you the first prompt to start writing your story. Choose the one that you most like and fire up your writing. Then, every minute (or the time you choose in the app settings) the app will give you a new prompt for you to add new ideas, words, characters, sentences, places or actions to the plot. Quite a challenge to turn your writing into a game! THIS APP IS GOING TO MAKE YOU... • Improve your writing. The best way to learn how to write is writing, and you're going to write a lot. • Write everywhere. You will make the most of the time by sparking your creativity. • Inspired. Forget about creative blocks and carry always the muses with you. • Get fun. Because writing must be funny and when we enjoy, everything gets easier. • Motivated. With this app, writing is like a game and you will want to write daily. ★★★★★ WRITING TIPS TO USE THIS APP: • Relax. Let yourself go and don't fix the text as you write. You will have time to check it out later. • Find your own rhythm. The time between the story steps is 1 minute, but you can change it and adjust it to your style of writing. • Try out. If you don't like the first prompt, don't worry. Try different options to trigger the spark. • Don't censor yourself. Write the first thing that comes to your head, no matter what. Free your creativity. • Persevere. Write every day. Writing is like any other discipline: it takes practice, practice and more practice. • Share. Use the app to create a longer story and share it in the NaNoWriMo writing marathon. • Have fun. Use the app exercises as a game. This way your writing will flow easily and the result will be better. • Enjoy your ideas in company. You can also use the app with your friends and create great stories together step by step. ★★★★★ Improvise and experience free writing is now funnier than ever. Great for all kind of writers, young and old. You will never fear the blank page again. Express your creativity and have fun. Happy writing!!
release_text: -We have added new prompts for you to get inspired. -We have included the posibility to choose the number of prompts you will use for writing a story, so you know when it is time to end it.

description: Bienvenue sur l’application mobile Espace Québec, un outil incontournable en ce qui a trait au cinéma et à la production télévisuelle du Québec à l’international. Cette application vous permettra de suivre de près les dernières tendances et nouveautés du milieu cinématographique et télévisuel québécois, et surtout, de les suivre dans leurs présences aux quatre coins de la planète. Suivez de près les créations et entreprises québécoises présentes aux événements majeurs tels Cinéma du Québec à Paris, le Festival de Cannes, MIPCOM, MIPTV et plusieurs autres manifestations du genre. L'application Espace Québec est un nouvel outil proposé par la Société de développement des entreprises culturelles (SODEC), qui a pour misison de promouvoir et soutenir l’implantation et le développement des entreprises culturelles au Québec et à l'étranger, et d'assurer la présence collective de ces entreprises dans les foires, festivals et marchés internationaux. L'application a d'abord une vocation de soutien pour les entreprises du cinéma et de la production télévisuelle sur le marché international. L'onglet principal de cette application changera au fil des présence de la SODEC et des entreprises québécoises lors d'événements à l'étranger. Pour certains événements et marchés, la SODEC abrite les entreprises sous son pavillon Espace Québec (MIPCOM et MITPV à Cannes, Festival de Cannes,...). L'application informera tant le public que les professionels des diverses activitées, projections et présences à remarquer lors de l'événement en cours. Dans le cas de Cinéma du Québec à Paris, un événement mis sur pied et organisé par la SODEC, aucun pavillon n'est en place, l'événement se tenant sur une semaine au Forum des images, à Paris, mais une grille horaire est disponible sur l'application ainsi que la programmation complète de l'événement, avec détails des filmns et activités. Lors d'événements ou la SODEC n'a pas de pavillon mais où une délégation québécoise est présente, et où des films sont sélectionnés, l'application donnera tous les détails de ces présences et des projections. Une galerie photos de l'événement en cours sera alimentée par la SODEC. Des onglets Partager à des amis et Facebook garderont actives les interactions entre les usagers de l'application, afin de la faire connaître de + en + au fil des événements. Il s'agit d'une application qui vient en soutien aux créations québécoises et ses professionnels qui s'y rattachent en sol étranger. Un pas de plus en avant pour la SODEC dans son mandat de soutien aux entreprises culturelles québécoises au Québec et à l'étranger. -Découvrez toutes les productions et événements ainsi que leurs lieux de diffusion lors des importantes rencontres internationales telles Cinéma du Québec à Paris, MIPCOM, Festival de Cannes, Berlinale, World Congress of Science and Factual Producers, NATPE, et autres; Producteurs, entreprises et autre professionnels de l’industrie ! -Repérez vos collaborateurs ainsi que les calendriers des rencontres de coproduction et autres événements privés où vous êtes inscrits et conviés.P -Partagez facilement vos informations sur vos réseaux sociaux préférés. -Visionnez les galeries de photos de chaque événement. -Retrouvez en un clic les directions GPS pour vous rendre au pavillon Espace Québec de la SODEC lors des événements. -Inscrivez-vous à notre infolettre pour recevoir toutes nos nouvelles, actualités et communiquées de presse. -Recevez nos messages push, vous permettant rapidement de suivre nos manchettes lors des sorties de presse ou autre évènement ponctuel et de vous rendre aux projections et événements.

Features of Triposo’s guide to Manchester: ★ Suggestions of what's interesting to see and do in Manchester, depending on time, weather and your location; ★ A detailed sights section with all the monuments of Manchester; ★ Eating out section with the best restaurants in Manchester; ★ Discover the nightlife of Manchester! Bars, pubs & disco's in Manchester; ★ Book hotels in Manchester directly from the app (when online); ★ Mini guides for day trip destinations close to Manchester; ★ An offline map of Manchester; ★ Complete background information of Manchester; ★ Currency converter; ★ Weather forecast (updated when online); ★ See current events (updated when online); ★ Lots of stars. Quotes from our users “Absolutely brilliant, made our holiday. Recommendations were worth while. Maps and directions were superb. We'd have been lost without it. Offline mode worked a treat. Thanks very much.” By Bragger93 from United Kingdom on May 14, 2013 “This is the travel app I've been waiting for!! One stop shop.” By Gun-Metal Gray from United States on May 21, 2013 “Leave your Lonely Planet or Frommer’s at home! This is your travel guide now.” By an Android User from Netherlands on Jun 8, 2013 About Triposo Founded by and for travelers, Triposo delivers up-to-date information, detailed maps and intelligent recommendations for more than 40,000 destinations in 200 countries around the world. To make our guides we use the content that is freely available. Open content sites like Wikitravel, Wikipedia, World66 and OpenStreetMap are among the best resources for any traveler. We consider location, time, weather and your personal preferences to deliver custom, real-time recommendations of places to go and things to see. Whether you are a planner or prefer to go with the flow, Triposo helps you discover the unexpected and experience travel in a new way. If you see any problem with the app, please write us an email at feedback@triposo.com so we can figure out what’s wrong and fix it. Thanks!
release_text: In our 4.0 release we've made it easier to plan & book your trip: - Better hotel screen with ratings and class so it's easier to pick the perfect hotel. - For all major sights you can easily find tickets & tours so you can skip the line or get a professional guide to show you around. - We've added a special section with your bookings so you can always find back your hotel using our offline map. Thanks for booking with us! - Still deciding? Checkout the new photo section tap menu > Photos.

description: The All-in-One App for Fishing Now you can easily access detailed information on over 1,400 Lakes, Ponds & Reservoirs throughout Alabama. Get real-time Lake Reports, Weather Conditions and Best Fishing Times. Review and mark your favorite HotSpots, and learn tips, tricks and techniques. -------------------------------- Impressive Feature List: -------------------------------- ✔ Access over 1,400 Lakes, Ponds & Reservoirs ✔ Easily Search a Lake with only a few letters ✔ Proximity Search to find a Lake near you ✔ Proximity search from a City, Town or Lake ✔ View & add HotSpots at your favorite Lakes ✔ Share your HotSpots or keep them Private ✔ View & add Live Lake Reports & Feedback ✔ Books, Mags & More – Save for Offline Reading ✔ Solunar Calendar to show Best Times to Fish ✔ Real-time Weather Conditions ✔ 4-Day Weather Forecasts ✔ View Nearby Photos at every Lake ✔ Species Reference with detailed info & images ✔ Access to State regulations & license information ✔ View maps & get directions to every Lake ✔ Link to numerous resources ✔ Great Fishing Tips, Videos & How To’s Get the App that every angler needs and Fish with Attitude ! Visit www.iFishAlabama.com for the latest Features, News, Coverage or if you have any questions or feedback!
release_text: Check out our new Videos section in the Essentials area! A few Kit Kat updates as well.

description: PDF Max 4 is a desktop class PDF app for reading, annotating or signing PDF documents on your Android. Mark up document with highlights and handwriting, insert texts and stamps, fill out, sign, copy/paste PDF pages and much more. With over 1.5 million downloads across platforms, PDF Max helps hundred thousands of people over the world to go paperless everyday. ***************************** Since PDF Max 4, the app requires permission(s) as follows: - Read Phone Status and Identity - required to terminate the read aloud progress when there is an incoming call. - Find/Use accounts on the device: No longer required since v4.1.0. ****************************** PDF Max 4 Features: * READING FEATURES - Fast PDF Rendering with large PDF support - Smooth vertical scrolling - allow you to scroll through your entire PDF document smoothly and efficiency. - Open documents in multiple tabs. - Multi-purposes SideBar includes everything you need to skim through your documents like never before: Page Thumbnails, PDF Outlines/Bookmarks, Annotation List & Search Panel. - PDF Text to Speech - Advanced PDF Text Reflow: This Amazing Text Reflow feature that helps you read your PDF easily with any kind of PDF. Forget the tedious pan & zoom steps, you now just enjoy reading your documents. - Smart Zoom: Double-tap on text blocks and PDF Max will zoom the touched text block to fit the screen. Simple & efficient reading. - Friendly & Easy to use User Interface * ANNOTATING FEATURES - Text markup: Highlight, Underline, Strike out & Squiggle - Unlimited threaded comments (notes) attached to any annotation. - Create VOICE ANNOTATIONS: Record and embed voice annotations within the PDF document. - HANDWRITING with Advanced Zoom-In Writing feature - Eraser tools to manipulate your handwriting - Shape tools to draw Line, Arrow, Rectangle & Oval with intelligent snapping - Rich format Freetext tool to type over PDF pages - Stamp tool to insert Predefined, Standard Business Stamps & Custom Stamps - Signature tool to manage and insert your signatures - Undo/Redo function to correct your mistake * EDITING FEATURES - Manage PDF Pages (Insert, Copy/Cut/Paste, Reorder & Delete PDF Pages) - Manage PDF Outlines (Table of Contents) , PDF Embedded Links * FORM-FILLING FEATURES: - Support Text field, checkboxes, radio buttons, dropdown list, buttons & date-time fields - Support JavaScripted-powered PDF forms - Support AcroForms & Static XFA Forms - Zoom-in writing to fill out scanned/non-interactive PDF forms - Multiple signatures support, plus one-time signature for customer * PDF OUTLINE, PDF LINK & BOOKMARK MANAGEMENT FEATURES - Create and manipulate PDF Outlines - Create and manage PDF Bookmarks - Create and edit PDF Embedded Links * FILE MANAGEMENT FEATURES: - Auto syncing with Dropbox, Box, OneDrive & Google Drive with offline support - Copy/Move PDF documents between cloud storage services - Built-in PDF Library management * OTHER FEATURES - Bookmarks management with ability to export as PDF Outlines - Email or Print PDF via Google Cloud Print - Auto or manual saving - PDF documents/forms modified by PDF Max are compatible with Adobe Acrobat standard We can't bring more and better features without your help, so please rate us five stars to encourage faster updates! Follow us on Facebook at www.facebook.com/Mobeera for supports and updates, and feel free to email us at support@mobeera.com for any inquiry. Now, Let's go annotate!
release_text: NEWS: Flattening PDF is coming very soon! - Fixed: Crashed when loading Outlines from some PDF documents - Fixed: Some minor bugs Enjoy the world's best PDF app for Android!

description: Ihr seid es Leid, Umlaute umständlich eingeben zu müssen? Dann seid Ihr hier genau richtig! Diese App beinhaltet eine deutsche Tastatur, die Euch die Eingabe von Umlauten sowie deutschen Zahlen- und Datumsangaben erleichtert. (z.Z. nur für Smartphones geeignet) Tastatur aktivieren unter "Sprache und Texteingabe": 1. Deutsche Tastatur aktivieren/freischalten (Warnung siehe Hinweise!) 2. Standard-Eingabemethode "Deutsche Tastatur" auswählen Die Form der 2 Schritte können je nach Android-Version und Hersteller variieren. Haptisches Feedback aktivieren unter "Ton": 1. Haptisches Feedback anhaken 2. Vibrationsintensität (Drückvibration) anpassen Vielen Dank an die Spender aus Basel, Neumarkt in der Oberpfalz, Köln, Bielefeld, Eltze, Hamburg, Bensheim und Berlin! Hinweise: Wenn Ihr Verbesserungsvorschläge habt, könnt Ihr mir diese gern als Kommentar hinterlassen. Allerdings ist es besser, mir direkt eine E-Mail zu schreiben, denn so kann ich Euch Rückfragen stellen. Android warnt bei der Aktivierung von nachträglich installierten Tastaturen, dass die Eingaben an Dritte weitergeleitet werden könnten. Diese Tastatur-App sammelt natürlich keine Daten und besitzt auch keine Berechtigung für den Aufbau von Internetverbindungen! Diese App wurde mit größter Sorgfalt entwickelt. Trotz dessen kann ich keine Haftung für mögliche technische Schäden übernehmen. Ye are sorry to have to enter umlauts awkward? Then you are exactly right here! This app includes a German keyboard that you simplify the input of special characters and German figures and dates. (Coll suitable only for smartphones) Enable keyboard in "Locale and text": 1 Enable German keyboard / unlock (see warning notes!) 2 Select default input method "German Keyboard" The shape of the two steps may vary depending on the version of Android and manufacturers. Enable Haptic Feedback in "Sound": 1 Hook Haptic feedback 2 Adjust vibration intensity (push vibration) Thank you to the donors from Basel, Neumarkt in der Oberpfalz, Cologne, Bielefeld, Eltze, Hamburg, Bensheim and Berlin! Notes: If you have suggestions, you can leave me this as a comment like. However, it is better to write me directly an email, because I can ask you questions. Android warns in the activation of subsequently installed keyboards, that the entries could be passed on to third parties. Of course, this keyboard app does not collect any data and also does not have permission for setting up Internet connections! This app has been designed with utmost care. In spite of this, I can not accept any liability for any technical damage.
release_text: * bzgl. der Datensammlung siehe Hinweise!!! Version 1.8.2: * Einschalten der Tastatur vereinfacht * lernendes Wörterbuch Hinweis: Smartphones deren Hersteller die Textdienste aus Android entfernt haben, beginnen mit einem leeren Wörterbuch. (z.B. Samsung, HTC oder Huawai) Version 1.7.3 * Spracheingabe * Caps-Lock-LED leuchtet nur bei Shift-Arretierung Version 1.6: * separate Ziffernreihe aktivierbar * variable Tastenhöhe * Zeitbelegung für ' und " * transparenter Hintergrund im Querformat

description: Atlético de Madrid official app has the most exclusive information and services from one the best clubs in Spain in an elegant presentation, in line with what Atlético de Madrid fans have come to expect. All the club news including official club communications, the real time match chat make AtléticoDeMadrid the best sport's supporters network by far, with members from all over the globe sharing their passion for the game and for their club. Now more than ever share your Atlético de Madrid official app experience with your Facebook friends. Atlético de Madrid official app offers you: • Access in real time to the goals of Atlético de Madrid in the Champions League tournament. • Access to all the official news of the club • Official photo gallery • Access to Atlético de Madrid's official YouTube channel • Follow matches live, with photos and comments. • Check results and match reports • Check the league table • Chat with other Atlético de Madrid supporters around the world. • Social games to interact with other Atléticos worldwide. • Use your Facebook account to be in contact with your friends via AtleticodeMadrid! • Read player profiles

** 자주묻는 질문 ** [위젯 설정 하는 법] 1. 홈 화면에서 메뉴키 -> 추가 -> 위젯을 누른다. 2. 위젯 목록에서 RememberDay_1x1, 2x1, 3x1 세가지 사이즈 중 한가지를 선택 한다. 3. 디데이 정보 입력 후 등록을 누르면 홈화면에 위젯이 생성 된다. * 위젯 배경사진 설정을 잘 활용하시면 예쁜 위젯을 만드실 수 있습니다^^ RememberDay는 살면서 특별한 날, 기억하고싶은 날 기억해야하는 날 등을 간편하게 관리할 수 있도록 도와주는 어플입니다. 1x1, 2x1, 3x1사이즈의 위젯을 제공하며 위젯의 폰트 색상, 크기조절, 배경 색상, 배경 투명도 조절기능과 외장메모리에있는 사진을 위젯 배경으로 설정할 수 있고 사진찍기기능으로 바로 찍어서 위젯배경으로 설정할 수 있습니다. RememberDay어플의 목록 탭에서는 현재 등록되어있는 디데이들의 리스트를 관리 할 수 있습니다. 날짜 계산기 탭에서는 기준일로부터 몇일 전 후의 날짜를 쉽게 계산해볼 수 있는 기능과 두 기준일 사이의 일수를 쉽계 계산할 수 있는 기능을 제공 합니다. 홈화면에서 위젯을 삭제하여도 해당 디데이 정보는 삭제되지 않으며 해당위젯은 비활성 상태가 됩니다. 비활성되어 있는 위젯은 위젯 등록화면에서 정보를 다시 불러와 재등록 할 수 있습니다. 주의 사항 RememberDay어플은 위젯을 제공하는 어플로 내장메모리에 설치되어야 정상동작을 보장할 수 있습니다. 외장메모리에 설치하실 경우 정상동작되지 않을 수 있음으로 내장메모리에 설치해 주세요^^ 위젯의 디데이 날짜 업데이트는 안드로이드 시스템 특성상 최대 30분의 오차가 발생할 수 있습니다. 부족한점이 많지만 앞으로 꾸준히 업데이트 해 나가겠습니다. 어플을 사용하면서 불편한점, 개선해야 할 점, 버그등을 메일 또는 리플로 알려주시면 적극 검토하여 업데이트하겠습니다. RememberDay어플로 자신만의 특별한 날들을 관리해보세요. 감사합니다^^ [ 업데이트 사항 ] v 3.0.1 - 기존 사용자 업데이트 시 홈화면에 설정해놓은 위젯 사라지는 현상 수정. - 기타 보고된 마이너 버그 수정. v 3.0 - 기존 다소 투박했던 UI에서 깔끔하고 더 편하게 사용하실 수 있도록 UI 전면 수정. - 매월 반복, 매년 반복 디데이 계산 기능 추가. - 애플리케이션 잠금 기능 추가. - 알림설정 ON/OFF 기능 추가. - 위젯에 배경사진 적용시 화질 개선. - 애플리케이션 안정화. - 기타 보고된 버그 수정. v 2.5 - 광고모듈 수정 - 날짜선택 시 일부 날짜가 안나오는 버그 수정(예 : 2012-02-29) - 기타 보고된 버그 수정 v 2.4 - 활성 상태인 위젯도 디데이 목록에서 삭제 가능하도록 수정 v 2.3 - 일부 단말에서 폰트 고딕체로 고정되는 현상 수정 - 기타 보고된 버그 수정 v 2.2 - 날짜 선택 UI변경 - 기타 보고된 버그 수정 v 2.1 - 일부 UI 변경 - 정렬기능 추가 v 2.0 - 위젯의 텍스트 정렬 기능 추가(왼쪽, 가운데, 오른쪽 정렬) - 일부 UI 변경 - 위젯 폰트 사이즈 추가 - '기념일 보기'의 지나간 기념일 회색으로 표시 - 기타 보고된 버그 수정 v 1.3 - 단말 재부팅 시 위젯이 정상적으로 표시되지 않던 버그 수정 - '기념일 보기' 화면에 기념일 계산기 기능 추가 -500일 ~ 3500일의 자동으로 계산되는 기념일 리스트 외에 -99999 ~ 99999일 사이의 기념일을 계산할 수 있습니다. - '기념일 보기'의 기념일 리스트 표기 방법 수정 기존 D-500 ~ D+3500으로 표시되던 기념일 리스트를 500일 전 ~ 3500일 로 표시되도록 수정 - 위젯의 배경 이미지 설정 기능 변경 기존 위젯배경 이미지 설정 시 이미지가 늘어나거나 줄어드는 현상으로 이쁘지 않게 적용 되던점을 수정하여 위젯 사이즈에 맞게 배경 이미지가 이쁘게 적용 되도록 수정. v 1.2 - 아이콘 및 로딩화면 변경 - 날짜 선택 시 해상도가 낮은 단말에서 완료버튼이 보이지 않던 버그 수정 ---- 개발자 연락처 : 01051186966 ** Frequently Asked Questions ** [To set the widget]    1 On the Home screen, press Menu key -> Add -> Widgets button.    2 from the list of widgets RememberDay_1x1, 2x1, 3x1, choose one of the three kinds of size.    3 Press the D-day, and then register to enter information on the home screen widget is created.   * Widget background photo widget settings to take advantage of you can create a beautiful ^ ^ RememberDay lives - a special day to remember the day you want to remember me, and that helps you easily manage applications. 1x1, 2x1, 3x1 size widget provides a widget's font color, size adjustment, background color, background transparency of picture adjustment function and the external memory can be set to the widget background in photography functions you can just take a Widget background be.
