Match fruit together in juicy combos - the more you match the bigger your score! Be the best Fruit Matcher! Challenge your Facebook friends and become the fruitiest person out of everyone you know! But watch out for Marlon monkey, who just can't stop himself from stealing your fruit to satisfy his sweet tooth. Use bonus items to reach a higher score or just to keep Marlon from making trouble. Colourful and fun with catchy, bouncy music!
release_text: Bug fixes ************** It's been a long time but here's a big update! The game has been completely re-written from scratch and has many improvements to all aspects of the game. Better graphics, better social features, better game play - just download it or we'll send Marlon Monkey over to steal your fruit ;)

description: If you love the farming life or are just a fan of parking games then this 3D Tractor Parking has it all for you. Make your way around these farm roads then park up so the farmer can get to work. Once he has complete his task you will move onto the next level and need to park up in a new spot. Just how good are your tractor parking skills? Can you avoid the 3D obstacles and get into the parking zone perfectly by driving carefully? Good job you're not going to bump into any crazy farm animals or that would be chaos. How fast can you finish the 10 awesome 3D levels in this awesome Tractor Simulation?

Have you ever wanted to ride a pony to victory on your very first race? Well now you can make it a reality with this fun and exciting my pony race game. Now you can easily pick your horse between 2 different fast race ponies that will lead you to victory. This pony game allows you to race your horse against the 4 other horses and try your best to jump over the obstacles in your way as you complete each race level. So if you love ponies and you really like to see what it is like to be in a race then make your dream a reality with your own little pony race ! Features: - CHOOSE your very own little pony to race from 2 fast race ponies - TAP the run button quickly to make your pony run super fast - TAP the jump button once to make your horse jump over any obstacle in its way - FEED and water your pony between races to make sure she is ready to run - ENJOY winning races and being a champion race pony winner ** We already work on the next updates to add more ponies and races so stay tuned and enjoy this free girl game.

Do you talk or snore in sleep? Do you know any thing happen when you in sleep? This App can record the sound when you in sleep. The key point is adjust the record level sensitivity. When the sound high than record level. The sound will be record. High-quality WAV file format. You can also setting auto stop timer and delay timer. Drag to select where to start playing. Upload the record files to Dropbox ,E-mail or other applications.

Do you know any fruits? Do you know any vegetable? Test your knowledge with the Fruity & Co quiz app! Divided into 7 levels you will find 164 Fruits & Co. For every pic you will receive 100 points if you've quess directly correct. For each failed attempt you will lose 5 points. Do you have a small (typing)error, 2 points are substracted. In the Statistics section you can check how you have currently ranked the world! If you do not know a pic, use a Hint! We will make available more levels and still perform some optimizations.

Tap on bright bricks to remove one-color groups. Use "Up" button (top right corner) to add new row and update bricks combination. Challenge other gamers in pursuit of highscore. description: Jewels is the #1 Match-3 casual game on Android! This game is a smash hit casual game with satisfying and juicy shining jewels. By playing this game you may find yourself hopelessly addicted to swapping the glorious jewels. It is a simple but extremely fun match-3 game. How to Play: - Match 3 identical jewels to eliminate them - Match more jewels for multiple points FEATURES: - Three Game Modes: Normal, Time, Infinite - Outstanding graphics and music - Easy-to-play interface with save function

Now trending worldwide - Makeup Transformation - Transform yourself to someone you know or something? ★★★★★ The very best English application! ★★★★★ You will LOVE THIS App! You can Speak English fluently like a native speaker! Fast! Even if you’re a beginner. The Perfect starter for anyone who wants to learn to speak like a native speaker. Speak Real English! This English application is the revolutionary, one-of-a-kind English learning system! The traditional English that you’ve learned in class will not make you speak like a native speaker. Most foreigners have studied years of grammar, learned thousands and thousands of English words, read magazines and newspapers, and spent a lot of money on English classes. Why are they unable to speak English fluently and confidently? Most foreigners feel embarrassed to talk in english because of the following reasons . . . - fear of grammar - fear of peers - not comfortable with a native speaker So what’s the best solutions to speak English fluently? You must practice speaking, speaking, and speaking! Build a Foundation Start speaking English immediately using essential words and phrases - Very practical, easy-to-follow lessons that guide and teach you the structure of English in just 20 minutes a day. - Within each lessons new vocabulary is presented in flashcard style. This allows you to learn the meaning of any unfamiliar words quickly and easily with the help of handy English translations. - Learn about the real English expression and more. - The lessons focuses on real everyday situations - from introducing yourself,asking others about their jobs and what they do, talking about how you feel and asking about the conditions of others, asking where and what are the hottest restaurants, and talking about your likes and dislikes - are those that are most practical communication. - These lessons featuring practical vocabulary, practice speaking, workbook, and Test. - Interactive Audio lessons to help you perfect your pronunciation and teach spoken language organically All our lessons will develop your English speaking skills immediately so you can put your English to use when abroad or dealing with English-speakers everywhere!

Listen to classical music online or download classical music with this free android app! In Johann Sebastian Bach Music app we have compiled the best classical music from one of the greatest classical music composers of all time. Johann Sebastian Bach life (31 March [O.S. 21 March] 1685 – 28 July 1750) Johann Sebastian Bach was a German composer whose musical works categorizes as Baroque music according to classical period timeline, he is one of the great German classical composers and Johann Sebastian Bach works and classical masterpieces have become an important part of the history of classical music. In this free app for android you can choose to learn more about the composer in Johann Sebastian Bach biography, or listen to some of the composer’s most famous classical music free. This app is a perfect way to get to know more about the history of western classical music; everyone can enjoy this music, play classical music for kids and adults. Some people even play classical music for babies; there is theory that that this will make them smarter. Even if this theory not is proven correctly, this is perfect relaxing music for babies. Download Johann Sebastian Bach Music free app now, learn more about one of the most famous classical music composers of all time and stream music free android! Features: In this app Android you will be streaming classical music online, so you will need to have Internet access, we recommend WiFi whenever possible. However, there is an option to download classical music free to your android, this way you can listen to classical music from this app even when you don’t have Internet access. To stream classical music is a great option if you have good internet connections, you will save memory on your device and have a wide option of music to choose from directly in this music app for android. If you download classical music mp3 files with this android app you will be able to listen to music free at all times, even if you don’t have internet connection, but you will be limited to a number of classic music pieces by the memory space on your device. This app consists of Johann Sebastian Bach mp3 music only.

description: Incredibly simple and yet quite handy flashlight app. Will use your device's camera LED (camera flash) as a torch. Tiny Flashlight is currently the best led flashlight app on the Android Market, because: - It supports the widest range of devices with camera led (camera flash) - It's the fastest and brightest flashlight / torch on the market - Has different widgets to choose from - Has great and diverse screen lights including Morse code, Strobe, Police lights - Quality support Light sources: ============== * Camera LED - Uses your phone's camera led to emit bright light. Note that some devices don't have a camera led. In this case the led flashlight option will be disabled, but you can still use one of the screen lights. * Screen Light - This is the basic white screen light, which is bright enough for daily use. You can use it as your primary flashlight option in case your device doesn't have a camera led or you want to save the battery. * Warning Lights, Police Lights, Color Flashlight, Strobe light, Morse Code, Text to Morse, Manual Morse Code - Different light sources, which may be useful in many situations. You can change the brightness and the colors. CAUTION: Strobe lighting can trigger seizures in photosensitive epilepsy! Flashlight Widget: ======== Tiny Flashlight is one of the few applications on the android market, which is free and has different widgets to choose from when the device has an option for a led flashlight. Flashlight Permissions: ============ Why Tiny Flashlight needs so many permissions and how are they used: * TAKE PICTURES AND VIDEOS (CAMERA flashlight) - In order to start the camera flashlight (led flash) on some devices, Tiny Flashlight has to use a small part of the camera hardware and it needs this permission. Don't worry, I'm not taking any pictures or videos without your permission. Tiny Flashlight is just accessing the camera flashlight (led flash). * CONTROL FLASH LIGHT - This is the old method of accessing the camera flashlight on Android 1.5 and 1.6.
release_text: * Reintroduced Strobe Light, Morse Code, and Color Light inside Tiny Flashlight. Now you can delete the standalone plugins if you have installed them. * Fixed several bugs

New Zealand GuideWithMe is an offline travel guide, which recommends detailed articles around the country in relation to your current location. Developed by travelers and for travelers, GuideWithMe is a rich source of general travel info as well as off the beaten track advice. Get around guides, phrase lists, warnings how to stay safe and healthy, restaurants and hotel recommendations, local costs and taxes, road rules and a variety of other info are carefully stored in one app. Essentially complete articles with multiple hotel and restaurant listings are suggested for Wellington, Auckland, Christchurch and other travel destinations. ­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­ • USE OFFLINE. Save money on roaming fees and refer to the articles even if you are offline and cellular data is not available. Mobile Internet is pretty costly in New Zealand! • DISCOVER ARTICLES RELATIVE TO YOUR LOCATION. Switch between country, region, city, travel topic articles recommended for your travel destination and current location. New Zealand travel guide contains around 220 articles covering the whole country. • GET RELIABLE INFO. All info comes from wikivoyage project, which is constantly updated by adventurous travelers and aspiring writers. Articles are vividly illustrated with more than 200 well­ chosen pictures and images. • VIEW ON THE MAP. GuideWithMe is based on map data, provided by MAPS.ME, offline maps app. An option to view the place on offline map is offered. With MAPS.ME you will always have maps of any countries in your pocket, of course including the whole map of New Zealand! ­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­ We are waiting for any advice and feedback about GuideWithMe app. This will help to suit GuideWithMe app to your expectations and tastes. Your reviews and ratings are always welcome. Send them to android@guidewithme.com or leave a feedback in Google Play review section. Check out our travel guides: http://guidewithme.com/ Follow us! Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/guidewithme Google +: http://plus.google.com/+Guidewithme/ Twitter: @GuideWithMe Enjoy your travels! IMPORTANT: currently the app is available only in the English language.
release_text: ● Updated articles and images from wikivoyage ● Fixed minor issues

Library Now lets you locate and search your library catalog wherever you are. Locate books, movies, music and more with easy search features designed for mobile devices. Searching the catalog is easy! Just type in the first few letters of the words in your search. For example, to search for "Mark Twain", just type "ma twa." Use Library Now to do the following: Find your local library: * Get library hours and phone numbers. * Map library locations and directions. * Discover library events: * Search for events at any or all libraries. * Search by audience, language and type of event. * Browse featured programs. Access the entire library catalog: * Search for books, movies and music and more. * Place holds if you have a library card With a library card you can manage your account: * Check the status of your holds. * Cancel holds. * Check due dates. * Renew items. * View your account balance.

This application displays an signal strength level icon (antenna icon) in the notification area and the status bar. That's it! When you use a data-only SIM, your device might always display "No signal". At that case this app may be useful! Otherwise, hmm...do you want to see signal strength in units of dbm? This app can display it in status bar. Functions - Signal strength icon appears in the status bar. - Signal strength in dbm units appears in the notification area. - When internet communication in 3G is available, a blue antenna icon is displayed. When it's not available, a gray icon is displayed. - Signal strength in dbm units can appear in the status bar. Permissions used in this app is for follows. - Run at startup It's used to start automatically when you restart the device. - Read phone status and identity It's used to obtain the signal strength of the device. Device ID is NOT used. - View network connections. It's used to confirm the availability of the Internet connection. (This privilege allows no internet communications.) - View Wi-Fi connections. It's used to obtain the signal strength of wireless LAN.
release_text: - 1.0.6. Fixed a "no signal" indicator. - 1.0.5. Display WiFi signal strength in units of dbm, when WiFi monitor enabled. - 1.0.5. Fixed a bug that causes crashes. - 1.0.4. LTE support - 1.0.3. Fixed a bug that causes crashes. - 1.0.2. Added an option to display an signal strength in dbm units in the status bar. - 1.0.1. Fine-tuning icon images. - 1.0.0. First release

description: Swing through the jungle with Mowgli, the young orphan adopted by wolves, as he learns to live in a tropical wilderness with the help of his faithful friends Baloo the bear and Bagheera the panther. Includes language packs for English, French, German and Spanish. Join Mowgli on a tropical adventure through the jungles of India as he escapes the clutches of the dangerous Shere Khan. Experience the colourful wilderness and enjoy the exotic sights and sounds of the jungle in this, the latest classic tale to get a sprinkling of StoryToys magic. Rich animation, 3D pop-up scenes and wonderful sound effects transport you to the world of Mowgli and friends where the reader can take part in the story. • Search the undergrowth with the help of a variety of jungle animals to find baby Mowgli • Knock fruit off trees and into Baloo’s mouth • Pick thorns out of the wolf’s paws, bandage them and squish some itchy bugs • Give elephants a cooling mud bath before washing them down with fresh water • And much more… StoryToys specialises in creating 3D pop-up books, which look just like real books. Magical interactive pop-up scenes and games bring classic tales into the digital world, seamlessly bridging the gap between books and games and making reading an activity children will love. Some reviews of our previous titles: “The variety and innovation of the activities found within the pop-up scenes will have your child asking to read this story again and again.” ~ Jinny Gudmundsen, USA Today “StoryToys has near-brilliantly rethought children's books. This application evolves the very concept of what a story can be.” ~ Jeremy Horowitz, iLounge “Every page keeps the reader wanting more. The interactivity of the pop up pages is superb.” ~ Leanne McGinty, Ahgoo Review “Now THIS is what I call an app!! My jaw dropped when I started reading this interactive book.” ~ Sylvia Duckworth, French Apps for kids “Stunning. If I had to sum up this app in one word it would absolutely be stunning.” ~ Danielle Smith, TheresABook.com Now includes optional extras - a 3D Sticker Book and a Jigsaw Puzzle Pack, with lots of content absolutely free, plus the option to purchase more (this feature can be turned off in the Parent Center).

We proudly present a new generation word guess game: Emoji Word Guess! All images are prepared with style! Enjoy the nice looking colorful flat icons and use your reasoning to guess what the hidden phrase can be. There are more than hundreds levels in the game. At each level you are given 2 emojis or icons which try to tell you something. Your mission is to guess what these pictures try to tell you. If you stuck at a certain level, you can use 3 different types of hints: - Show me a letter: Shows a letter from the hidden phrase. - Remove junk letters: Removes the unnecessary letters and leaves only the required ones. - Show me the answer: You can take a short cut and go directly to the answer. Emoji Word Guess has an online leaderboard on Google+, so that you can see your friends' levels and also you can compete with other Emoji Word Guess fans all around the world. We hope you enjoy it!

A name can tell a lot about a person! Names are not randomly chosen: they all have a meaning. Sometimes you'd like to know if a relationship with someone could work out. With Love Calculator you can compute the probability of a successful relationship between two people given their names!!!

This is a pack of shaders for old-school video game emulators. Copyrights are held by the respective authors. *NOTE*: This is not a standalone game or emulator. You will not even get an icon in the Android launcher after it is installed. Instead it works as an add-on to compatible emulators. Most of the shaders are converted from the work of their original authors, in order to make them work on GLES 2.0. Shader files are based on the higan XML shader format version 1.0, with slight changes and enhancements. The format itself is quite straight-forward. Following shaders are currently included: • hq2x/hq4x • Scanlines • Motion blur • Grayscale Source code is available at https://code.google.com/p/emulator-shaders/ Welcome contributing new shaders to the project! In the meantime, we would also like to see more compatible emulators in the future!
release_text: - Added shader LCD3x. - Fixed HQ2x on certain devices.

description: **Download the Arcade hit game Trampoline Man FREE today on Google Play and get jumping!!** Meet Trampoline Man. He’s a little stickman who just LOVES to pull off awesome flips and tricks on the trampoline! Have a go and see for yourself, before you know it you’ll be hooked! Happy flipping! Key Features: - Addictive, simple gameplay for all ages - Three different modes to perfect your skills - Over 50 Achievements / Trophies to collect - Google Play Leaderboards to track your progress against your friends and the rest of the world Modes: *Classic* (previously freestyle) - climb as high as you can by performing flips but perfect those landings or you’ll lose height, or even worse - crash! *Timed* - 60s on the clock to get the highest score possible *Arcade* - follow the flip instructions, you have 3 lives - how long can you last? Tips for becoming a Trampoline Man Pro: - Hold the left side of the screen to do a backflip and the right side to do a front flip - land your jumps as straight as possible (on your feet) - Get a perfect or great landing and you’ll get a height boost and the most points. - A good landing is still okay. You get points but won’t lose or gain any height. - A poor or a bad landing will still get you points, but you will lose height. - Don’t land too far on your side or it’s game over. - More flips in one jump gets you more height and bigger scores!

※▶ 스마트폰 필수 어플 - 카드 혜택(스마트 가계부)!! ◀※ ▶▶ Excel 파일 출력 기능 추가 ◀◀ 모바일에서 작성한 가계부 내용을 엑셀 파일로 출력 할 수 있습니다. Excel 파일 출력은 sdcard/Cardbenefit 폴더에 생성 됩니다. 카드는 사용하지만 카드사에서 지원하는 카드의 혜택을 모두 쓰시지 못하는분께 필수!! "통신비 할인", 주유 할인", "마트 할인", "극장 할인".... 모든 할인 혜택을 최대한 누리고 계신가요? "카드혜택" 어플이 소지하고 계신 카드의 혜택을 모두 누릴 수 있도록 도와 드립니다. 카드의 할인 혜택을 최대한 활용하여 가계 지출을 줄여 보세요. 매월 몇 만원 ~ 많게는 십 만원 단위까지 절약할 수 있습니다 !! "스마트 가계부(카드혜택)" 어플을 활용하여 가계지출을 줄여 보세요. 어플에서 직관적인 UI를 적용하여 달력 형태로 보여 드리며, 각 날짜에 사용한 카드 횟수와 현금 사용 횟수를 Badge로 알려 드립니다. 그리고, 사용하시는 분들께 편의를 위하여 리스트에서 카드와 현금을 아이콘으로 구분 하는 기능을 추가 하였습니다. ★ 문의사항 및 개발자에게 요청하기 ★ 문의 사항 및 오류수정 요청은 kandroidmobile@gmail.com 으로 메일을 주시면 신속한 처리를 받으실 수 있습니다. 또한 설정메뉴 > 메시지함 에서 바로 "개발자에게 메일쓰기"로 요청을 하셔도 됩니다. ★ 카드 혜택의 주요 기능 ★ ※ 문자 자동 인식 수신 SMS 문자를 이용하여, 카드혜택과 분류를 설정하실 수 있습니다. ※ 카드 사용 내역확인 일별 단위로 한 눈에 쉽게 볼수 있도록 가계부를 작성하였습니다. ※ 결제일로 보기 기능 각 카드의 결제일을 등록 하시면, 해당월에 결제될 금액이 얼마인지 확인 하실 수 있습니다. ※ 혜택 내역 확인 기능 각 카드에 포함된 "할인혜택"을 최대한 사용하실 수 있도록 도와 드립니다. ※ 가족카드 등록 기능 가족 카드를 함께 등록 하여 카드사용 총액과 혜택내용을 함께 볼 수 있습니다. ※ 분류별 표시 기능 가계지출을 줄이기 위해 어떤 부분을 줄여야 할지 살펴 보시는데 도움을 드립니다. ※ 데이터 백업/복구 기능 단말기 교체나, 초기화를 하실때 이전에 있던 데이터를 안전하게 백업 및 복원 하실 수 있습니다. ※ 카드혜택의 모든 데이터는 암호화 되어 있으므로 해킹 걱정 하지 않으셔도 됩니다. ※ 잠금 기능 어플 자체 잠금 기능이 포함 되어 있습니다. ※ 할부 입력 기능 할부 기간을 설정하시면 총 금액을 자동으로 계산하여 정리합니다. ※ 테마 변경 기능 ※ 어플 사용법(설명서)이 포함 되어 있습니다. ☞☞ 카드혜택 어플 활용법 ☜☜ 국*카드의 예를 들어 설명 드리겠습니다. 국*카드의 경우 연회비 한 장으로 여러 혜택을 볼 수 있는 카드를 발급 받을 수 있습니다. 각각의 카드들은 다양한 할인 혜택이 주어 집니다. 예를 들어 "A카드"는 주유일 한 달에 30만원 까지 리터당 100원 할인을 해 줍니다. 그럴 경우 "설정 > 혜택 추가/편집"에서 "카드 혜택"을 추가 합니다. 혜택 이름은 알기 쉽게~~ (예를 들어 K*스마트 주유할인) 최대 혜택 금액은 주유 할인이 30만원 이니까요~~ 30만원 입력 하십니다. 다음 카드사는 K*국*카드 이므로... 선택을 합니다. 여기서 잠깐!! 카드 등록은 카드를 한번이라도 사용(사용후 문자 수신) 하시면 자동 등록 됩니다. 만약 사용 하셨던 카드가 아닌 경우는 "보유카드 추가/편집"에서 등록 하시면 됩니다. 그런 다음 카드를 선택 합니다. 만약 위에 말씀 드렸던 K*국* 스마트 카드를 가족카드도 발급 받으셨다면, 가족 카드도 선택 해 줍니다. 할인 혜택의 경우 모든 가족 카드의 사용을 포함하여 30만원입니다. 따라서 모두 등록을 해 주셔야 정확히 30만원만 쓰실 수 있습니다. 주유 할인 카드가 여러장 있을 수 있으니 30만원까지만 쓰시고, 그 이후는 다른 주유 할인 카드를 쓰셔야 경제적입니다. ^^ 등록을 모두 하셨으면, 카드 사용후 문자가 오면, 혜택을 선택 해 주시면 됩니다. 카드사에 맞게 혜택 종류는 모두 자동으로 읽어와 집니다... 아~~주 편하죠.. ^^ ☞ 카드 등록 방법 ☜ 카드 등록은 기본적으로 카드를 한번이라도 사용하여 문자를 수신 하면 자동으로 모두 등록 됩니다. 혹시 결제일변경이 필요하시면 "보유카드 추가/편집"에서 하실 수 있습니다. 직접 카드 추가를 하실 경우 주의 해야 하실 것이 있습니다. - 카드 사용자 - 카드 번호 이 두가지는 카드 사용후 수신 되는 문자에 내용이 포함 되지 않는 경우는 비워 두셔야 합니다. 혹시라도 입력 하시고 싶으시다면 입력은 하시되 체크는 하시면 안됩니다. 절~~~대!! K*국* 카드의 경우 "사용자/카드번호"모두 포함이 됩니다. 하*S* 카드의 경우도 "사용자/카드번호"모두 포함이 됩니다. 외*카드의 경우는 사용자 이름만 있고, 카드 번호는 없습니다. 삼*카드의 경우는 사용자이름, 카드 번호가 모두 없습니다. 즉, 삼*카드의 경우 직접 입력을 하실 경우 카드사용자, 카드번호를 비워 두시거나 체크를 하지 않으셔야 합니다. 그리고 마지막 한 가지... 성함뒤에 "님" 꼭 붙여 주세요~~~~~ 아참!! 카드사마다 다릅니다만, 사용자 이름이 김*나님 이런식으로 *로 되어 있는것 그대로 입력 하셔야 합니다... 카드 번호 역시 1*1* 형식이 틀리면 안됩니다.. ^^ 모조록 "카드 혜택(스마트 가계부)" 어플을 사용 하시면서 한 푼이라도 아끼셔서 부~~~~자되세요~~ ---- 개발자 연락처 : ---- ※ ▶ essential smartphone app - card benefits (smart household)! ◀ ※ Add ▶▶ Excel file output function ◀◀ You can output to an Excel file created on a mobile household contents. description: The first pocket calculator for the Android Wear operation system. Perform calculations quickly without using your cell phone. It is simple and easy to use, a great helper for on the go. Switch between basic and scientific functions. Use also your voice to input calculations. Download now for free. To start the app. Just say: OK Google...Start calculator. Get more apps, games & news with "Android Wear Center": http://tinyurl.com/m87stxs Basic functions: division, multiplication, subtraction, addition, decimal point, result Scientific functions: trigonometric functions, logarithmic functions, exponential functions, modulo operation, constants pi and e, square root function Choose from two themes: - Classic theme - Flat theme Please note: -Make sure your mobile is compatible with Android Wear. -Make sure to pair your phone with the wearable device with help of the Android Wear app. -To open: Go to "Start..." and open the app "Calculator" or say "Start calculator" Do you have any suggestions for improvement? Any ideas? Any issues with the app? Please let us know.
release_text: - Use your voice to input calculations - Automatically close brackets - A new calculator theme - Better usability on round devices - Layout optimized - Hide app drawer icon after first app launch on mobile phone - Fixed bug: On some devices, the buttons do not respond correctly.

description: Now you can download popular Amigo browser for Android. Enjoy your favorite websites through an easy and comfortable interface. Enter to the address bar either known URLs or search queries, Amigo will define what you need and show you results. You only need to type a few characters and then use full search suggestions. If you don’t want to type, just say what you are looking for – and the browser will find it. Take advantage of Mail.Ru’s built-in search engine: important information, such as weather forecasts or exchange rates, is often included in the search results. Make your search more specific by picking a search category. For example, if you need a post card, look in Images; for a new episode of your favorite TV series, search Videos. The News category contains the latest reports from multiple sources. Apps offers thrilling new games and useful software for smartphones and tablets. To have instant access to the search engine, put the widget on your home screen. The browser maintains a history of all the websites you visit. Bookmark interesting and frequently visited pages and put them on your smartphone or tablet’s home screen in order to have one-tap access to them. What’s more, you can send a webpage to your friends by using the Share feature. The browser's main screen includes links to many popular websites, including Twitter, Facebook, Mail.Ru, OK.ru, VK.com, My World. A summary of the latest news will help you always be well informed.
release_text: - устранена проблема с виджетом для домашнего экрана

description: Text, chords and tabs of singers and groups whose name starts on U. Easy navigation, friendly design.

The official Arriva Bus App has a range of features designed to make it easier for you to get around on Arriva buses in the UK. Whether you want to know the time of the next bus, where the nearest bus stop is or how long before you get to your destination, the Arriva Bus App is for you. Since launching in late 2013, the app has been downloaded over 300,000 times across all platforms and is being used by Arriva customers on a daily basis. It also now provides real-time updates for all of the Arriva Bus fleet. So, in a situation when things are unfortunately not running to plan, you can use the app to know when and how we can still get you to your destination. Find out more at www.arrivabus.co.uk/app App Features 1.Trip Planner This will help you plan how to get from A to B. It can detect where you are and plan from there, or you can tell it where you want your journey to begin. It will work from postcodes, bus stop name, or place names. 2.Live Map This will default to your current location, but you can set it to show any starting point, and it will show you a map of your route with the buses actually moving along the route. 3.Timetable It will either use your current location or you can input a different bus stop to start from, and it will tell you the time of the next bus from that bus stop. 4.Favourites In this section you will be able to manage favourite places and trips. 5.m-tickets This will link you through to the Arriva m-ticket app, which will enable you to buy tickets on your mobile phone.
release_text: When completing a Trip Plan, you will now be presented with the cheapest Adult Day pass that is valid for your intended Journey. Tapping this line, will automatically take you to that ticket in the Arriva m-ticket app. Note – The Arriva m-ticket app has been completely updated and is much improved over more recent versions. So why not replace your paper saver ticket today? Other minor fixes and UI improvements.

description: Battery Calibration is helpful app, which you should use when you think that your battery is performing bad. Battery Calibration also shows you some battery parameters like temperature, charge level, general condition, etc. How should you use Battery Calibration? Here is some manual: 1) Charge your phone until the battery is 100% full. 2) Click 'Calibrate!' button. 3) Let the battery completely discharge. 4) Charge the battery once more to 100%. Note that this free application is ad supported and contains ads.
